Beautiful women go missing and turn up dead around every corner, and the clues point to the least likely of suspects.

game.name: James Pond - Codename Robocod (USA)
game.story: James Pond is a gaming legend and true retro-classic. Now with better graphics and more puzzles, James Pond, codename: Robocod, has become the most playable scrolling platform game ever. This is James Pond's greatest adventure yet - 100 action-packed levels in which the aquatic super-hero jumps, climbs, squashes, squishes and stretches his way through level after level of some of the best cartoon-style game graphics ever seen.

game.name: Jane's Hotel (USA) (En,Fr,Es)
game.story: Jane's dream is to run the greatest hotel in the region, like her great-grandparents used to. Guide her journey starting from her small 2 star hotel on the outskirts of her home town. Treat your customers well to build up riches, reputation, and fame. Work your way up to a beautiful 5 star hotel, and win the Best Hotel of the Town contest!

game.name: Jelly Belly - Ballistic Beans! (USA) (En,Fr,Es)
game.story: A fast-paced arcade style game of skill, Jelly Belly Ballistic Beans! combines simple but highly addictive gameplay with a world-recognized license to provide a gaming experience that will appeal to casual players as well as seasoned veterans. Try your hand at hundreds of puzzles across 8 different themes. Simple to pick up, but impossible to put down! The main objective is to get the required number of Jelly Belly Beans into the matching cups while scoring points, using power-ups, and earning bonuses along the way. Players use the bean launcher to propel the beans through intricate puzzle patterns. Exploding beans, rocket beans, and extra beans are just some of the power-ups to help players beat the puzzle quickly to score medals.

game.name: Jenga - World Tour (USA)
game.story:
Jenga World Tour is a take off of the popular board game in which you take blocks from the lower part of a block tower and set it on top without toppling it. The premise is the same for the video game, using the Wii remote, you pull the blocks while moving the remote and using "A" button while using the "B" button to tap them out gently to keep the stack from toppling over.
There are several different backgrounds (in the pit of a volcano, medieval England, underwater, prehistoric times or even the Himalayan Mountain) you can play in, each having their own special differences, such as blocks freezing in the Himalayan stage or only being able to hold onto hot blocks in the volcano for a limited time or even avoiding catapults in the England stage.
There is also an arcade mode where you play a continuous game of Jenga or you can play against a friend in multi-player mode. The Nintendo DS runs along similar lines, using the stylus pen to pull out and tap blocks out of place, but doesn't have the same levels as the Wii version, but does have the same kind of effects (i.e. ice blocks, cement blocks and even UFO attacks). You can also play against a friend using Wi-Fi.

game.name: Jeopardy! (USA)
game.story: Jeopardy! is a game show style quiz game for play on the Nintendo DS/DSi platform. An accurate representation of the iconic TV show of the same name, Jeopardy! features over 2,400 clues, 1-3 player support and realistic representations of real-life host Alex Trebek and members of the Jeopardy! "Clue Crew." In addition to familiar Jeopardy! "answer-question" gameplay, the DS version contains "commercial break" mini-games and trivia as well as functionality that simulates an in-game studio and audience

game.name: Jet Impulse (Japan)
game.story: Jet impulse is a 19-level flight simulation / action game using all the touch capabilities of the Nintendo DS. The story revolves around young pilots who must fight in a bloodthirsty war to save the world. It is possible to play 2 to 4 players using the console's wifi.

game.name: Jetix Puzzle Buzzle (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It,Nl,Sv,No,Da,Fi)
game.story: Puzzle Buzzle est un jeu de réflexion sur Nintendo DS. Plusieurs modes vous attendent dans ce clone de Tetris et vous demanderont le plus souvent de bons réflexes pour espérer battre votre adversaire. De fait, placez intelligemment vos figures et rejoignez votre vaisseau le plus rapidement possible.

game.name: Jewel Legends - Tree of Life (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,Nl)
game.story: The Hods, magical beings with a pure heart, once lived in harmony with the sacred Tree of Life. But the immense greed of an evil demon forced the Hods into hiding. Now a new hope is emerging. Rebuild the world of the Hods in this Adventure and "match-three-of-a-kind" puzzle game and restore the old strength of the Tree of Life! Collect resources and build wonderful structures like Bubble Baths, Mushroom Farm and Fountain of Wonders. Highlights of Jewel Legends - Tree of Life: 3 game modes (Adventure, Tournament, Free play), formidable mini-games, build a huge village for the Hods.

game.name: Jewel Link - Atlantic Quest (Europe)
game.story: The player is tasked with reconstructing 11 buildings within the ruined city of Atlantis by matching identical tiles together.

game.name: Jewel Link Mysteries - Mountains of Madness (USA) (En,Fr,Es)
game.description: Jewel Link Mysteries - Mountains of Madness (USA) (En,Fr,Es)
game.story: Jewel Link Mysteries: Mountains of Madness is a game combining hidden object search and puzzle solving on DS. In the heart of Antarctica the player must shed light on disturbing disappearances, in particular by performing mini-games by matching colors of gems.

game.name: Jewel Master - Cradle of Athena (USA) (En,Fr,Es)
game.story:
Will the Goddess of Wisdom be merciful to you? In this one of a kind Match 3 Adventure, swap adjacent tiles so that rows of three or more of the same symbols emerge. By doing this, you will collect food, building resources, jewels and gold, as well as magical artifacts for your mission.
Experience 100 new levels! Construct 20 monumental buildings! Pit yourself against Greek myths in 15 Bonus Levels! New Bonus Tools and Bonus Game Modes

game.name: Jewel Master - Cradle of Persia (USA) (En,Fr,Es)
game.story: Journey through 100 levels of challenging match 3 fun and enjoy the exhilarating process of rebuilding this once great empire. Build 20 masterpieces from Ancient Persia. Restore the Persian Empire and free the genie from Aladdin's lamp. Featuring all new trophies, tools and puzzles.

game.name: Jewel Master - Egypt (USA) (En,Fr,Es)
game.story: Welcome to the country of the Pyramids and the Sphinx, the cradle of civilization! Match 3 sources of wood, gold and more to create Egypt. Proceed on a time trip back to the origins of old Egypt, and witness the origin of one of the most fascinating cultures in the history of Humanity!

game.name: Jewel Match (USA) (En,Fr)
game.story:
This is the Nintendo DS release of the well-received match-3 game Jewel Match for Windows/Macintosh. Due to the limited screen size of the handheld, the grid size of the levels had to be cut down from 14x14 to 12x12 tiles, thus forcing a complete redesign of all the levels. While at it the developers added some DS-only gameplay options like the new magical storm where the player can blow into the microphone to reshuffle the jewels.
The basic idea of Jewel Match comes from Bejeweled / Diamond Mine - the player is presented with a grid of jewels. By swapping pairs of tiles which are next to each other, rows of three or more identical jewels can be formed that will disappear instantly, giving points to the player and making room for other gems falling from above to take their place. The levels have gaps and shaped areas, though, so pieces do not simply fall vertically but also can fall diagonally.
Jewel Match has its own victory criterion though. On each of the 150 levels, a selection of squares have gold or even silver backings. One match (gold) or two (silver) must be created over each of these against a ticking clock to clear the level. Later in the game there are jewels tied to their square with a golden or silver chain, which thus are not falling down and blocking empty squares beneath them. These jewels can be freed by matching them once or twice, too, which means that the most difficult squares must be matched four times (silver chain and silver background) to be cleared.
A succession of hammers are unlocked once you have scored a certain amount of points. The first removes a particular jewel, the second not only removes the gem but also any effects (background or chains) on the square, and the final one removes all gems of that colour. Another extra to be unlocked is a magical storm that will have the player blow into the DS microphone to mix up the jewels. Moreover, matching more than three jewels in a row will create gems with special powers. Matching four will create a joker gem while matching five gives a gem that, once activated, will destroy the whole row it is in.
The game also offers a hot seat mode where two players can play the same level right after another, competing for the better clearing time.

game.name: Jewel Match 2 (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Nl)
game.story: Jewel Match 2 is a classic Match-3 puzzle game for Nintendo DS. Combine the diamonds and gems into rows of 3 or more. There are many different levels and increasing bonuses that can be used to complete even the most difficult levels. The game is played on both screens of the device.

game.name: Jewel Match 3 (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Nl)
game.story: Rebuild the five castles of Nevernear in this amazing Match 3 adventure. Match dazzling gems across 100 inventive levels in search of keys, potions, and more. Use portals, call on wizards, learn spells, and plant magical gardens to ward off evil. Play fantastic Hidden Object and Puzzle mini-games throughout the journey. Enjoy a beautiful soundtrack along with bonus Wallpapers.

game.name: Jewel Quest - Expeditions (USA)
game.story: The highly successful jewel matching game is here for the Nintendo DS! The popular jewel matching adventure returns in a daring journey across the seas and into the heart of Africa.

game.name: Jewel Quest - Mysteries (USA)
game.story: Contains both Jewel Quest Mysteries and Mysteryville - 2 great hidden objects games in 1! In Jewel Quest Mysteries, follow Rupert and Emmas efforts to reassemble the original set of Jewel Board jewels. Each game will set the player on a world-hopping adventure, uncovering the story of each jewels place in history along the way. Mysteryville tells the story of the town of Mysteryville facing a baffling occurrence: cats are disappearing in the quiet town. As an ace reporter for Countryside Life Magazine, its up to you to find the truth. Visit the shops, question the residents and examine every detail to find the answers behind this feline mystery!

game.name: Jewel Quest - Solitaire - Solitaire with a Twist! (Europe)
game.description: Jewel Quest - Solitaire - Solitaire with a Twist! (Europe)
game.story: Jewel Quest Solitaire takes you on an adventure through the South American Jungle matching cards, swapping jewels and discovering hidden secrets! Featuring unique tri-peaks solitaire gameplay, you must match card suits to earn pieces for the Jewel board turning it to gold. Unearth buried cards, discover special moves and avoid cursed jewels to solve 114 all new card layouts. Riches and glory are in the cards, play them wisely or your journey could soon end! Solitaire with a challenging twist! 114 jewel-themed solitaire card decks 684 possible card scenarios Two game modes - play Full Quest Mode or Just Cards Mode Engaging storyline and sweeping animations.

game.name: Jewel Quest - Solitaire Trio (USA) (En,Fr,Nl)
game.story:
Triple The Solitaire Fun!
Love Solitaire? Jewel Quest Solitaire Trio brings together Jewel Quest Solitaire I, Jewel Quest Solitaire II and Jewel Quest Solitaire III all into one package! Enjoy Tri-peaks, Nester and Klondike with Jewel Quest jewel board mini games in between!
Game Features:nn- Over 300 solitaire layoutsnn- Power ups, wild cards, multipliers, buried cards and more keep the action goingnn- Addictive Jewel Quest jewel board mini games between levelsnn- Engaging quest storylines progress through each game

game.name: Jewel Quest 5 - The Sleepless Star (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Nl)
game.story: Jewel Quest 5: The Sleepless Star is a puzzle game for Nintendo DS. Follow the adventures of the explorer Percy Pack, who is in search of a mysterious jewel, throughout this puzzle game that will challenge your brain through more than 150 puzzles.

game.name: Jewel Quest IV - Heritage (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Nl)
game.story: Jewel Quest IV: Legacy is a puzzle game for Nintendo DS. Under the guise of a scenario located in castles from the time of Hernan Cortès, you will have to go through more than 170 boards, grouped in 3 game modes, to shed light on the story of a mysterious family.

game.name: Jewel Quest Mysteries 2 - Trail of the Midnight Heart (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Nl)
game.description: Jewel Quest Mysteries 2 - Trail of the Midnight Heart (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Nl)
game.story: Jewel Quest - Mysteries 2 is a hidden object game for Nintendo DS. In this sequel of the series, Eva Witheby winds up far from home after answering her uncle's call, exploring new regions like old Shanghai or the mystic Taj Mahal. By finding unique items and precious relics in regular static images or in the newly implemented scrolling screens, players are able to gradually clear up the secrets alongside Eva Witheby.

game.name: Jewel Time Deluxe (USA) (En,Fr)
game.story: Jewel Time Deluxe is packed full of gem swapping match 3 games plus loads of new twist and turns to keep you entertained for hours! Offering new gameplay modes for increased enjoyment & longevity, Jewel Time Deluxe offers casual gamers a new match 3 experience.

game.name: Jewelpet - Mahou no DS Kirapikarin (Japan)
game.story: Jewel Pet will ask you to take care of a furry or feathered companion. Like a Tamagochi, you will have to watch it closely so that it is clean, fed and you don't end up losing your virtual pet companion.

game.name: Jewelpet - Mahou no Oheya de Issho ni Asobou! (Japan)
game.description: Jewelpet - Mahou no Oheya de Issho ni Asobou! (Japan)
game.story: Jewel Pet will ask you to take care of a furry or feathered companion. Like a Tamagochi, you will have to watch it closely so that it is clean, fed and you don't end up losing your virtual pet companion.

game.name: Jewels of the Ages (USA) (En,Fr,Es)
game.story: Two full games in one - Jewels of Olympus and Jewels of Ancient Pharaoh's! You've conquered many puzzles before but now you must summon your greatest skills as you take on a series of epic challenges! In your quest to gather a collection of priceless ancient artifacts, countless adventures lie ahead of you. Travel with Odysseus, help conquer the city of Troy, participate in the Olympics, end the Pharaoh's ancient Curse, and more!

game.name: Jewels of the Tropical Lost Island (USA) (En,Fr,Es)
game.description: Jewels of the Tropical Lost Island (USA) (En,Fr,Es)
game.story: Match 3 game wrapped in a story of a search for treasure among the Caribbean islands, battling sea monsters and pirates.

game.name: Jigapix - Pets (USA) (En,Fr,Es) (NDSi Enhanced)
game.story: In Jigapix Pets complete Jigsaw Puzzles from cats to cockatoos, guinea pigs to gold fish, horses to hamsters!

game.name: Jigapix - Wild World (USA) (En,Fr,Es) (NDSi Enhanced)
game.story: The world is a wild place! In JIGAPIX WILD WORLD you'll find 80 amazing images of the wildest animals, from the bottom of the oceans, across vast plains, to the deepest tropical jungles; including Apes, Big Cats, Reptiles, Birds, Insects, Sea Life and more!

game.name: Jigapix - Wonderful World (USA) (En,Fr,Es) (NDSi Enhanced)
game.story: In Jigapix: Wonderful World jigsaw puzzle fans take on the addictive challenge of solving 80 landscape puzzles created from picturesque and iconic images sampled from around the world. Puzzles images included in the game come from eight different regions, as well as eight different sizes, making piecing images together more and more challenging as familiarity with regions fade and the dimensions of puzzles change. Players can solve the puzzles alone or with a friend via a wireless connection, and for those needing an occasional break from jigsaw play, there are three additional mini-games included in the game. Finally, DSi owners can take the game to a whole new level as they are able to snap photos and create their own personalized jigsaw puzzles out of the imported images.

game.name: Jigsaw Puzzle DS - DS de Meguru Sekai Isan no Tabi (Japan)
game.description: Jigsaw Puzzle DS - DS de Meguru Sekai Isan no Tabi (Japan)

game.name: Jigsaw World - Daigekitou! Jig Battle Heroes (Japan)
game.description: Jigsaw World - Daigekitou! Jig Battle Heroes (Japan)
game.story: Jigsaw World - Daigekitou! Jig-battle Heroes is a japanese puzzle game for Nintendo DS. It features various hero characters, 144 puzzles with an anime-like art style and a main story mode, segmented in episodes. To complete the levels and get the highest score, puzzle pieces have to be collected and placed as fast as possible on the correct spot. Additionally, an integrated 2-Player mode makes it also possible to challenge friends or compete with other players.

game.name: Jiji Tsuushin Shuppan-Kyoku Kyouryoku - Katei no Igaku - DS de Kitaeru Shokuzai Kenkou Training (Japan)
game.description: Jiji Tsuushin Shuppan-Kyoku Kyouryoku - Katei no Igaku - DS de Kitaeru Shokuzai Kenkou Training (Japan)

game.name: Jillian Michaels Fitness Ultimatum 2010 (USA)
game.story: Building on the success of her first videogame, star fitness trainer Jillian Michaels returns to Wii/DS with a new and improved fast-paced, high-intensity workout in Jillian Michaels' Fitness Ultimatum 2010. Set on a rugged, Pacific jungle island, players will enter a Hell Week-style boot camp filled with many new features and workout modes for 2010, including more accurate motion tracking and a calendar system enabling the user to program routines on a period of up to 6 months. Finally, you'll never train alone with direct feedback and motivation from Jillian for greater results! Game design by health and wellness expert Jillian Michaels: > Features Jillian's motion-captured movements > Fitness routines created by Jillian > All-new audio from Jillian

game.name: Jinsei Game Q - DS Heisei no Dekigoto (Japan)
game.description: Jinsei Game Q - DS Heisei no Dekigoto (Japan)

game.name: Jinsei Game Q - DS Shouwa no Dekigoto (Japan)
game.description: Jinsei Game Q - DS Shouwa no Dekigoto (Japan)

game.name: Jissen Pachi-Slot Hisshouhou! DS - Aladdin II Evolution (Japan)
game.description: Jissen Pachi-Slot Hisshouhou! DS - Aladdin II Evolution (Japan)

game.name: Jissen Pachi-Slot Hisshouhou! DS - Hokuto no Ken (Japan)
game.description: Jissen Pachi-Slot Hisshouhou! DS - Hokuto no Ken (Japan)

game.name: Jissen Pachi-Slot Hisshouhou! DS - Hokuto no Ken SE (Japan)
game.description: Jissen Pachi-Slot Hisshouhou! DS - Hokuto no Ken SE (Japan)

game.name: Joan Jade and the Gates of Xibalba (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Nl)
game.description: Joan Jade and the Gates of Xibalba (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Nl)
game.story: Joan Jade and the Gates of Xibalba is an adventure game with hidden object screens, where the main objective is to solve all the puzzles from one location to open a passage and move to the next one. As in most point-and-click games, the player has to collect objects from the scene, stored on the inventory always visible at the bottom, and use them on specific portions of the screen to perform an action or complete a task.

game.name: John Deere - Harvest in the Heartland (USA) (Rev 1)
game.description: John Deere - Harvest in the Heartland (USA) (Rev 1)
game.story: Craft fertile soil into a profitable, prize winning and picture-worthy farm. Prepare land and livestock to produce goods with which you can profit, and earn money to purchase John Deere equipment, land, or livestock to improve your farm. Use the touch screen and stylus to Sculpt the Heartland into the farm of your dreams.

game.name: Johnny Bravo in the Hukka-Mega-Mighty-Ultra-Extreme Date-O-Rama! (USA) (En,Es,It)
game.description: Johnny Bravo in the Hukka-Mega-Mighty-Ultra-Extreme Date-O-Rama! (USA) (En,Es,It)
game.story:
Wannabe stud Johnny Bravo is thrilled he's invited to appear on the game show Hukka Mega Mighty Ultra Extreme Date-o-Rama to try and win a dream date with a hot chick, but even with his self-professed stunning good looks, incredible strength, and superior intelligence he has his work cut out for him to win the competition.
Can you beat your rival studs and get the girl in this side-splitting action game based on the hit Cartoon Network series?

game.name: Johnny Test (USA) (En,Fr,Es)
game.story: Push the limits of reality as Johnny Test in this physics-bending Nintendo DS game based on the hit Cartoon Network show. When Johnny meddles with one of his genius twin sisters' out-of-this-world science experiments, he plunges the town of Porkbelly into chaos. Now Johnny and his loyal pooch Dukey must break all the rules in order to save his friends in this action-packed platformer adventure!

game.name: Jojo's Fashion Show - Design in a Dash! (USA) (En,Fr,Es)
game.description: Jojo's Fashion Show - Design in a Dash! (USA) (En,Fr,Es)
game.story: 20 years after her meteoric ascent and sudden disappearance from the runway, hot fashion designer Jojo Cruz is making a comeback. Can you help Jojo mix and match today's hottest fashions and prove to the world that she's still got style? Use the Nintendo DS stylus to dress models in thousands of different stylish outfits from Jojo's collection. Explore a wide variety of clothing styles ranging from Western to Bridal to Eveningwear. Race against the clock at each runway show and unlock hundreds of unique clothing items and accessories. Play 60 action puzzle levels by matching styles and finding hot signature outfits!

game.name: Jonas (USA) (Rev 1)
game.story: Live out the rock star life of the JONAS band members and find out how everyday life collides with the pop star world in the new JONAS video game for Nintendo DS. Inspired by the latest hit Disney Channel Original Series, JONAS invites fans to play as band members Nick, Joe and Kevin in non-stop, hilarious adventures set in exciting TV show locations ,featuring JONAS music and friends Stella and Macy. Tear up the stage, juggle school and friends, and still make it home in time for dinner. Players must stay on their toes and steer clear of JONAS-mania in this musical adventure with their favorite superstar idols.

game.name: Josefine Skolehjelp - Norsk - Kaos i Kommaby (Norway)
game.description: Josefine Skolehjelp - Norsk - Kaos i Kommaby (Norway)

game.name: Journey to the Center of the Earth (USA)
game.description: Journey to the Center of the Earth (USA)
game.story: In Journey to the Center of the Earth, players can relive the excitement from the film as they ride a dangerous rock slide, navigate an out-of-control mine cart, raft across an ancient sea and survive from being chased by a Gigantosaurus. Utilizing the unique controls of Nintendo DS to play as all three main characters from the movie, Trevor, Sean and Hannah, gameplay will take place throughout seven worlds from the film.

game.name: Juiced 2 - Hot Import Nights (USA)
game.story: Juiced 2: HIN evolves the current street racing scene, letting players experience the culture of the real-life HIN tour, the nation's largest lifestyle custom car show in an intense racing experience. Featuring track and drift racing at real-world locations around the globe, next-gen AI and vehicle customization, Juiced 2: HIN brings street racing to life, allowing players to test their skills at live street racing events against a back-drop of DJs, fashion, models and musicians. New features include addictive drift/ powersliding races and "Driver DNA" that tracks gamers' personal driving traits.

game.name: Jumble Madness (USA)
game.story: For over 60 years Jumble has been one of the most popular word games in the world. Both in print puzzle and new online, Jumble has entertained millions with its simple mechanics and brain-teasing anagrams. Jumble Madness is the next evolution, bringing classic Jumble puzzles and new variants to the DS.

game.name: Jump Super Stars (Japan)
game.story: Jump Superstars is a 2D-fighting game featuring over 150 characters from different Japanese animation (anime) and comic (manga) series. The idea of the game is to beat the opposing characters out but there are also missions where the goal is also somethin

game.name: Jump Ultimate Stars (Japan)
game.story:
Jump Ultimate Stars is more or less an expanded version of the original game, Jump Super Stars. It features the same Super Smash Bros.-style fighting gameplay with a plethora of licensed manga characters, bringing in a wide variety of new franchises and characters. The roster has been expanded to more than 300 characters from 41 different manga titles. There is also Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection support, making global internet play a possibility.
Generally, the game is structured the same as the previous title. The player sets up decks made up of the three types of panels, which can be used on the fly with the touchscreen. There is a story mode, versus modes, several single-player modes, as well as a quiz mode and information archives and story synopses for each series. The method of obtaining new panels has changed, however: each character has a progress tree, and successful battles earn gems which can be spent to power up different characters.
The complete list of series represented is: Eyeshield 21, I''s, Ichigo 100%, Katekyo Hitman Reborn!, Captain Tsubasa, Gintama, Kinnikuman, Kochi Kame, Cobra, Sakigake!! Otoko Juku, Jigoku Sensei Nube, Shaman King, Jungle no Tar-chan, JoJo's Bizarre Adventure, Slam Dunk, Saint Seiya, Taizo Mote Ou Saga, D.Gray-man, Death Note, The Prince of Tennis, Dr. Slump, Tottemo! Luckyman, Dragon Ball, Naruto, Ninku, Hunter x Hunter, Pyuu to Fuku! Jaguar, Buso Renkin, Black Cat, Bleach, Hoshin Engi, Fist of the North Star, Bobobo-bo Bo-bobo, Majin Tantei Nogami Neuro, Midori no Makibao, Muhyo to Rouji no Mahoritsu Soudan Jimusou, Yu-Gi-Oh, Yu Yu Hakusho, Rurouni Kenshin, Rokudenashi Blues, and One Piece

game.name: JumpStart - Deep Sea Escape (USA)
game.story: As players hunt for oxygen tanks to rescue the sub and escape, they'll uncover hidden games, solve puzzles and defeat water monsters in an amazing aquatic world. Along the way, players can practice number recognition, critical thinking, spelling, addition, rounding, synonyms, antonyms, parts of speech and much more. JumpStart Deep Sea Escape is the fun, portable way to brush up on skills for school!

game.name: JumpStart - Legend of Lost Island (USA)
game.story: This is an adventure game in which players explore a secret island and engage in a variety of mini-games. Mini-games include educational activities such as spelling words from jumbled letters, counting pictures on signs, and adding numbered characters to equal a predetermined value.

game.name: Jungle School (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It,Nl)
game.story: You're the new teacher in the wildest class in school! Can you turn these underachieving kids into A+ students?

game.name: Junior Brain Trainer (USA) (En,Fr,De,Es,It)
game.story:
In this version of Brain Training designed for 6-11-year-olds, Junior Brain Trainer gives younger players a chance to practice important key skills in reading, writing, spelling, maths, geometry, logic and problem solving. It takes a different approach to the formula, by delivering information in smaller sessions, making it easier to take in. Gameplay is designed to suit a child’s attention span and ensures they are frequently occupied.
Unlockable games include:
1. Ghosts - use the stylus to touch a ghost and capture it. As many as possible must be caught within the time limit.
2. Twins - a memory game requiring pairs of people to be matched up against a time limit.
3. Snakes - a game of skill and timing that requires a snake to be guided around the screen to collect coloured sweets.
4. Football – the stylus is used to move a football boot across the screen kicking a ball against the wall to remove bricks.
5. Beggar My Neighbour – tap on a pile of playing cards with the stylus to play a move against the console. Whoever has the highest card wins the hand.
6. Balloon Pop - the D-pad is used to move a sling shot to the left and right. The A button fires at the balloons and pops them.

game.name: Junior Brain Trainer - Math Edition (USA)
game.story:
In this version of Brain Training designed for 6-11-year-olds, Junior Brain Trainer gives younger players a chance to practice important key skills in reading, writing, spelling, maths, geometry, logic and problem solving. It takes a different approach to the formula, by delivering information in smaller sessions, making it easier to take in. Gameplay is designed to suit a child’s attention span and ensures they are frequently occupied.
Unlockable games include:
1. Ghosts - use the stylus to touch a ghost and capture it. As many as possible must be caught within the time limit.
2. Twins - a memory game requiring pairs of people to be matched up against a time limit.
3. Snakes - a game of skill and timing that requires a snake to be guided around the screen to collect coloured sweets.
4. Football – the stylus is used to move a football boot across the screen kicking a ball against the wall to remove bricks.
5. Beggar My Neighbour – tap on a pile of playing cards with the stylus to play a move against the console. Whoever has the highest card wins the hand.
6. Balloon Pop - the D-pad is used to move a sling shot to the left and right. The A button fires at the balloons and pops them.

game.name: Junior Brain Trainer 2 (USA) (En,Fr,De,Es,It)
game.story: Junior Brain Trainer 2 is designed to put young minds to the test and improve memory, spelling, reading, logic and problem solving skills.

game.name: Junior Classic Books & Fairytales (USA)
game.story: Read daily on your DS! Mobile reading devices are becoming more and more popular, and now there is a way kids can get in on the action. Junior Classic Books gives kids the chance to read multiple classic books right on their DS!Designed for young readers 8 and up making reading fun and easy Features selected classic books that stand the test of time. Choose between two different font sizes and turn pages by sliding your finger on the screen. Get to know the timeless stories of Hansel and Gretel, Snow White , Pinocchio, Huckleberry Finn, Alice, Dorothy, Oliver Twist and many more. Features literature from well known authors such as Louisa May Alcott, Lewis Carroll, Charles Dickens, Brothers Grimm, Herman Melville, Oscar Wilde, Mark Twain and several others.

game.name: Junior Classic Games (USA) (En,Fr,De,Es,It)
game.story: Junior Classic Games features arcade, music, puzzle, logic and number games plus many more! Each game is designed to develop memory, logic and problem-solving skills in a colourful and stimulating environment. Adjustable difficulty levels for ages 4-9 and a medal reward system keep kids challenged and motivated at all times. With 90 medals to collect, are you ready for a classic game adventure?

game.name: Junior Island Adventure (USA)
game.story: Take a trip across a tropical isle! Follow the story of an Island boy on a quest to bring home the Three Holy Dolls. You must solve a total of 18 brain-teasing riddles and puzzles using memory, attention, and cognitive skills!

game.name: Junior Mystery Quest (USA)
game.story: Become a Secret Sleuth! Embark on a strange and mysterious journey in the newest detective game designed especially for kids! Junior Mystery Quest puts you in the middle of a captivating conspiracy, where the Tibutto family must solve the puzzle of their missing Uncle Alester. With challenges hidden around every corner, children must put their problem-solving skills to the test!

game.name: Just in Time Translations - Say It in 6 Languages (USA)
game.description: Just in Time Translations - Say It in 6 Languages (USA)
game.story: SAY IT WITH EASE! Whether you're traveling the world for business or pleasure, take this portable translator on your tip and perfect thousands of words and phrases to make conversations a snap.

game.name: Just Sing (USA) (En,Fr) (NDSi Enhanced)
game.story: Following in the trend set by very successful games such as 'Singstar', 'Karaoke Revolution' and 'Lips', 'Just Sing!' DS will take the singing party to a new level! Just Sing! will support all the standard features for singing games and boasts additional features specifically tailored for the DS and the DSi. In career based story (Single Player Mode) the singer strives to become a superstar, but must begin at the bottom. Singing in small venues to limited audiences, the player must perform increasingly well to progress to larger venues in order to generate the recognition they deserve. Fans, press and worldwide adoration all await at your fingertips! So what are you waiting for? Just Sing!

game.name: Just Sing! - Vol. 2 (Europe) (En,Fr,De) (VJVV) (NDSi Enhanced)
game.story: Karaoki Fun goes to the next level - put your singing talent to the test with brand new songs and challenges. Feel the real karaoke experience, sing into the Nintendo DS microphone and rock the 9 fabulously designed stages. Style yourself like the stars and prepare yourself for some great new challenges: Can you manage to sing the songs without the backing track - acappella?

game.name: Justice League Heroes (USA)
game.story:
The DS version on Justice League Heroes, while not following the plot of its console brethren, has a similar premise where you play as a member of the titular super-hero team and travel to a number of locations where hordes of enemies run amok.
The game is played with a top-down view of the environment on the lower screen and a map on top. The map displays the location of your next checkpoint and the positions of the enemies along with the status of your characters. The lower screen, in addition to the action, has various function icons that can be activated with the stylus.
There are about a dozen missions broken into about forty sections. Before each, you must pick two heroes from the line-up of Superman, Batman, Wonder Woman and Flash. Each has regular melee attacks, strong melee attacks, a ranged attack and a unique super-power move. They must use these abilities to defeat many enemies and move to the next checkpoint, completing objectives such as switch-flipping and item collection along the way. You may swap between your two heroes at any time by tapping an icon on the screen. Another icon lets you call in an AI-controlled hero for brief support. There are six of these to choose from: Martian Manhunter, Zatanna, Green Lantern, Aquaman, Green Arrow and Huntress. Each of these has a unique ability based on their powers.
In addition to the main game, there are two minigames and a third can be unlocked by inserting Justice League Heroes: The Flash into the GBA slot.

game.name: Juushinden - Ultimate Beast Battlers (Japan)
game.story: Jushiden : Ultimate Beast Battlers sur Nintendo DS est un jeu de cartes livré avec un accessoire pour lire les caractéristiques des vraies cartes que vous avez en mains. Vous devez donc acheter des boosters pour obtenir de nouvelles cartes et perfectionner votre deck. Il est possible de jouer contre l'ordinateur si vous n'avez pas de vrais adversaires à affronter.

game.name: K-1 World GP - Zettai Ouja Ikusei Keikaku (Japan)
game.description: K-1 World GP - Zettai Ouja Ikusei Keikaku (Japan)

game.name: Kabu Trader Shun (Japan)
game.story: Kabu Trader Shun is an adventure game that puts you in the shoes of an 18-year-old boy, Shun Aiba, who has always dreamed of being a trader. You are therefore parachuted into the world of business, the stock market and stocks. You will have to face many rivals to sneak up to the top. The game alternates between adventure phases and trading phases.

game.description: Kachou Shima Kosaku DS - Dekiru Otoko no Love & Success (Japan)

game.name: Kaite Oboeru - Doragana (Japan)
game.story: Kaiteoboeru Doragana is a Japanese educational game based on the Doraemon TV series. In this game, kids have to learn Katakana, Hiragana, and Japanese words that are taught by Doraemon. They also learn how to draw lines and shapes, and also match the Katakana letter to the correct Hiragana letter.

game.description: Kaite, Shabette, Hajimeyou! - Monster Farm DS (Japan)

game.description: Kakko Yoku Narou - Kaku-chan Shiki - Kintore Navi (Japan)

game.name: Kakuromaniacs (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It)
game.story: KakuroManiacs is a digital version of the classic Japanese number game, kakuro, which is like a numeric crossword. Fill the boxes with numbers between 1 and 9 so that all the numbers in a row or column (the "word") add up to the word's total. Words can only contain each number once.

game.name: Kakushi E Mystery - Riku to Yohan - Kieta 2-mai no E (Japan)
game.description: Kakushi E Mystery - Riku to Yohan - Kieta 2-mai no E (Japan)

game.name: Kamen Rider - Dragon Knight (USA) (En,Fr,Es)
game.story: Play as all 13 Kamen Riders from the Kamen Rider Dragon Knight TV series, each with their own unique Contract Beasts, Advent cards, and special abilities - More than 65 exciting missions on Ventara will test the skill of your Kamen Riders - Battle head to head with your favorite Kamen Riders in a unique battle system utilizing Contract Beasts and Advent cards. (2 player versus only available on Wii version) - Earn extra Advent cards and unlock additional special abilities that could be used on multiple game modes - Simple but versatile controls allow players of all skill levels to pull off their favorite Kamen Rider moves from the show

game.name: Kamen Rider Battle - GanbaRide - Card Battle Taisen (Japan)
game.description: Kamen Rider Battle - GanbaRide - Card Battle Taisen (Japan)

game.description: Kanbayashi Shiki Nouryoku Kaihatsu Hou - Unou Kids DS (Japan) (Rev 1)

game.description: Kangaeru Chikara o Gun Gun Nobasu! - DS Youji no Noutore (Japan)

game.name: Kanji no Wataridori (Japan) (Rev 1)
game.story: Kanji No Wataridori is an edutainment game featuring risky situations in which you have to react quickly. This requires, for example, succeeding in writing a word or a sentence in kanjis (Japanese characters) in order to avoid a dangerous situation. This cartridge is therefore mainly a game which highlights the ability of people to memorize kanjis.

game.name: Kanji Sonomama - DS Rakubiki Jiten (Japan)
game.story:
Kanji Sonomama DS Rakubiki Jiten ("Kanji As-it-is DS Fun-to-use Dictionary") is, as can be guessed from the name, a kanji dictionary for the Nintendo DS. It provides definitions for Japanese and English words in Japanese, using an intuitive hand-written interface for word look-up. There is a flashcard mode where a user can practice their kanji, and it also interfaces with Pictochat for use of the dictionary during conversations.
As a bonus, there are also several recreations of Nintendo's Game & Watch games present, which can be found and played by entering their names into the dictionary. Included are Ball (???), Flagman (??????), Judge (????), and Manhole (?????).

game.description: Kankyou Jidai no Koushiki Kentei - Eco Kentei DS - Tokyo Shoukou Kaigisho Kanshuu (Japan)

game.description: Katekyoo Hitman Reborn! DS - Fate of Heat III - Yuki no Shugosha Raishuu! (Japan)
game.story: The story takes place at the Vongola Base, where Tsuna is training with Basil. Suddenly, a young man named Gelaro introduces himself as the Vongola guardian of Snow from the Bertesco Family, they appear before Tsuna and the others and managed to freeze all the Vongola Rings with his Snow Ring power and states that if Tsuna wants to melt the frozen Vongola Rings, he must go to Catafalco Island in Italy where Gelaro and his family will be waiting for them. The game includes 7 story chapters with each chapter utilizing a different character and boss character.

game.story: Katekyoo Hitman Reborn - Flame Rumble X - Mirai Chou Bakuhatsu for Nintendo DS is a 2D fighting game. Based on the manga of Akira Amano, the title proposes to find the characters of the series in order to engage in dynamic duels.

game.description: Katekyoo Hitman Reborn! DS - Ore ga Boss! - Saikyou Family Taisen (Japan) (Rev 1)

game.description: Katekyoo Hitman Reborn! DS - Shinuki Max! Vongola Carnival!! (Japan)

game.name: Katekyoo Hitman Reborn! DS - Vongola Shiki - Taisen Battle Sugoroku (Japan)
game.description: Katekyoo Hitman Reborn! DS - Vongola Shiki - Taisen Battle Sugoroku (Japan)

game.name: Kawaii Koneko DS 2 (Japan)
game.story: Kawaii Koneko DS 2 is a management game for the DS in which you have to take care of a kitten for a period of 30 days. You have to feed it, play with it and walk it. After the 30-day period, the kitten will then decide whether or not to stay with you.

game.name: Kawaii Koneko DS 3 (Japan)
game.story: The third DS installment in the Kawaii Koneko series of kitten care simulators, and the fifth in total.

game.name: Kazoku Minna de - Nihon Shiatsu Shikai Kanshuu - Raku Raku Shiatsu Navi (Japan)
game.description: Kazoku Minna de - Nihon Shiatsu Shikai Kanshuu - Raku Raku Shiatsu Navi (Japan)

game.name: Keiji J.B. Harold no Jikenbo - Manhattan Requiem & Kiss of Murder (Japan)
game.description: Keiji J.B. Harold no Jikenbo - Manhattan Requiem & Kiss of Murder (Japan)
game.story:
Ce jeu présente deux histoires de J.B. Harold, détective privé. Les deux histoires sont chacune une version alternative, qui commence et se développe différemment les unes des autres, tout en laissant des caractères et des lieux communs. Un peu comme jouer à J.B. Harold dans deux réalités alternatives dans lesquelles l'affaire a été déclenchée différemment.
Gameplay: Dans ce jeu d'aventure roman à la première personne, vous aurez plusieurs dialogues à sélectionner lors des interrogatoires et des conversations informelles. Le jeu comporte également une fonction de réaction faciale qui le rend plus facile à saisir l'état de l'esprit d'une personne à qui vous parlez. La fonction de journalisation arrière vous permet de parcourir facilement les dialogues que vous avez peut-être sautés trop rapidement ou que vous souhaitez simplement rafraîchir votre mémoire. Le jeu marque également les questions que vous avez à poser, ce qui vous permet de vous répéter plus tard.
Requiem de Manhattan
Histoire: La lettre parvient à J.B. l'informant d'un meurtre survenu dans la ville de Liberty. L'expéditeur était Sarah Shields. Un appel téléphonique soudain d'un ancien inspecteur Judd, qui est maintenant dans le secteur de l'assurance, informe J.B. d'une autre affaire de meurtre. La personne en question est Sarah Shields. Apparemment, elle a sauté de son appartement au 5ème étage, quelque part à Manhattan. Il n'y avait aucun témoin et aucun élément de preuve indiquant un jeu déloyal. Cela semble être un cas propre pour la police. Mais J.B. n'est pas d'accord avec cela. Il a des questions ... qu'est-ce qu'elle tenait dans sa main sur la scène du crime, quels sont les indices qui manquent à la police, et surtout, pourquoi voudrait-elle se suicider?
Kiss of Murder
Histoire: Dans la partie ouest du village de Greenwich, une jeune femme a été assassinée. Le nom de la victime était Sarah Shields. Elle gardait un énorme saphir qui était assuré, mais le saphir a disparut. L'enquêteur d'assurance Judd, qui était un ex-détective, a contacté J.B. au département du meurtre de la police de Liberty City et lui a demandé de l'aide pour l'affaire.

game.name: Keiji J.B. Harold no Jikenbo - Murder Club (Japan)
game.description: Keiji J.B. Harold no Jikenbo - Murder Club (Japan)

game.name: Kekkaishi - Karasumori Ayakashi Kidan (Japan) (Rev 1)
game.story: Kekkaishi is an action game released on DS which is taken from the eponymous animated series. You play as Yoshimori Sumimura who is a kekkaishi, that is to say a demon hunter who creates magical barriers around his prey to imprison them. The game takes place inside Karasumori, a school in Japan. Your mission is to rid the school of all the monsters that lurk there.

game.name: Kekkaishi - Kokubourou Shuurai (Japan)
game.story: Kekkaishi: Kokubourou Shuurai on DS is an action game taken from the eponymous animated series. This is the second episode to be released on the Nintendo handheld. Step into the shoes of Yoshimori Sumimura again who is a kekkaishi, in other words a demon hunter who creates magical barriers to imprison his prey. Eradicate the looming threat!

game.name: Keltis - Das Spiel von Reiner Knizia (Germany)
game.description: Keltis - Das Spiel von Reiner Knizia (Germany)

game.name: Kemeko Deluxe! DS - Yome to Meka to Otoko to Onna (Japan)
game.description: Kemeko Deluxe! DS - Yome to Meka to Otoko to Onna (Japan)

game.name: Kenkou Ouen Recipe 1000 - DS Kondate Zenshuu (Japan) (Rev 1)
game.description: Kenkou Ouen Recipe 1000 - DS Kondate Zenshuu (Japan) (Rev 1)

game.name: Kero Kero 7 (Japan)
game.story:
Life in the world of Kerorinpo is pretty peaceful thanks to the actions of the Kero Kero Agency, a group of seven secret agents that take care of any trouble. However, there hasn't been any trouble of late, and the agency decides to take a bit of a break. Unfortunately, at this precise moment, a group of aliens decide to attack Kerorinpo and cause havoc for its citizens!
You play as Agent 7 of the Kero Kero 7. With the help of your assorted spy gadgetry, it's up to you to save Kerorinpo from the alien menace! Your all-purpose tools will appear on the touch screen for use when you need them. Is there a rock in your way? Tap the touch screen repeatedly to break it! Need to light a fuse? Strike the touch screen like lighting a match! You can even scratch your nails on blackboards to make them cry and use them as a lift!
Kero Kero 7 also features an assortment of spy tools for players to use. Record a voice sample and save it or send it to friends. Use your built-in stopwatch or set an alarm. Scribble away with your very own drawing tools! Annoy your friends with your own personal sound effect generator! Or share your secret agent data card with friends who have a copy of the game!

game.name: Keroro Gunsou - Enshuu Da yo! - Zenin Shuugou Part 2 (Japan)
game.description: Keroro Gunsou - Enshuu Da yo! - Zenin Shuugou Part 2 (Japan)

game.name: Keroro RPG - Kishi to Musha to Densetsu no Kaizoku (Japan)
game.description: Keroro RPG - Kishi to Musha to Densetsu no Kaizoku (Japan)
game.story:
When Keroro and Tamama play an RPG game, a strange castle appears and soon Inner Tokyo is filled with monsters from the RPG game. Under Natsumi's command, the Keroro Platoon are transferred to an alternate dimension. They then head to the Castle, where they are sent away immediately to find 3 Legendary Armaments.
Keroro RPG has similar gameplay to other titles in the Tales series. The player controls the Keroro Platoon and they can head to multiple towns, talk with NPC's and take on numerous quests.
In battle you can have only three members of the Keroro Platoon out in combat. You can also have help characters alongside you, composing of the companions you meet in the game and other Namco characters.

game.name: Ketsui Death Label - Kizuna Jigoku-tachi (Japan)
game.story: This port of Ketsui: Kizuna Jigoku Tachi was heavily reworked due to hardware limitations. Instead of the full game, it plays like a boss rush; it contains all of the game's midbosses and bosses, and only short segments in between bosses feature regular enemies. The scoring system was tweaked to account for the different gameplay focus.

game.name: Kid Paddle - Blorks Invasion (Europe) (Fr,Nl)
game.story: In Kid Paddle - Blorks Invasion, a third-person action game for the Nintendo DS, monsters have invaded Kid Paddle's world. But the young boy does not surrender without a fight; seven different levels await exploration and several minigames have to be completed on his way to defeat the mean aliens.

game.name: Kid Paddle - Lost in the Game (France)
game.description: Kid Paddle - Lost in the Game (France)
game.story:
Kid Paddle: Lost In The Game is a 3D side-scrolling platform game inspired by Midam's popular comic strip Kid Paddle. Kid Paddle and his friends go play games at the City Game Arcade, but things turn sour when they become trapped inside the game and Kid Paddle's friends are being held captive by the evil blorks. Kid Paddle must journey through four different worlds to save his friends by activating switches, jumping on platforms and fighting many different blorks. It's also possible to play as Little Barbarian and save the princess in two of the game's six worlds.
The game features the same worlds and story as the Wii version, but has different gameplay. The player can collect coins, shoot blorks, buy upgrades from Mirador's shop. The game features traditional platforming elements such as pushing blocks and jumping on platforms.

game.name: Kidou Gekidan Haro Ichiza - Gundam Mahjong +Z - Sarani Dekiru You ni Natta Na! (Japan)
game.description: Kidou Gekidan Haro Ichiza - Gundam Mahjong +Z - Sarani Dekiru You ni Natta Na! (Japan)

game.name: Kidou Gekidan Haro Ichiza - Gundam Mahjong DS - Oyaji ni mo Agarareta Koto nai no ni! (Japan)
game.description: Kidou Gekidan Haro Ichiza - Gundam Mahjong DS - Oyaji ni mo Agarareta Koto nai no ni! (Japan)

game.name: Kids Learn - 2Think - A+ Edition (USA)
game.story: Learn Music is a unique type of learning game that allows players to experience playing real instruments from around the world and learning about musical notes and symbols. Play a variety of instruments and in exercise mode they are free to create their own masterpieces with four different instruments. Kids can play with friends and family in both hot-seat and wireless multiplayer modes.

game.name: Kids Learn - Math - A+ Edition (USA)
game.story: Learn Music is a unique type of learning game that allows players to experience playing real instruments from around the world and learning about musical notes and symbols. Play a variety of instruments and in exercise mode they are free to create their own masterpieces with four different instruments. Kids can play with friends and family in both hot-seat and wireless multiplayer modes.

game.name: Kids Learn - Math and Spelling Bundle (USA)
game.description: Kids Learn - Math and Spelling Bundle (USA)
game.story: Pets & Vets Bundle includes two games for the price of one! In 'My Pet Hotel', a lot of exciting tasks and different pets are waiting for you! The playful little pets will need a lot of attention! Take care of six popular pets, have various individual interactions with animals, and learn more about your little guests in the pet dictionary. In 'My Vet Practice', start your own vet practice in the countryside and build beautiful stables and pens for many different kinds of animals. Dogs, cats, bunnies, parakeets, horses, puppies, and kittens are already waiting for your help!

game.name: Kids Learn - Spelling and Grammar - A+ Edition (USA)
game.description: Kids Learn - Spelling and Grammar - A+ Edition (USA)
game.story: Learn Music is a unique type of learning game that allows players to experience playing real instruments from around the world and learning about musical notes and symbols. Play a variety of instruments and in exercise mode they are free to create their own masterpieces with four different instruments. Kids can play with friends and family in both hot-seat and wireless multiplayer modes.

game.story: Learn Music is a unique type of learning game that allows players to experience playing real instruments from around the world and learning about musical notes and symbols. Play a variety of instruments and in exercise mode they are free to create their own masterpieces with four different instruments. Kids can play with friends and family in both hot-seat and wireless multiplayer modes.

game.description: Kiite Hajimeru - Eigo Kaiwa Training - Kikitore (Japan)

game.description: Kikansha Thomas - DS de Hajimeru Chiiku Gakushuu (Japan)

game.description: Kikansha Thomas - DS de Hajimeru Kokugo Sansuu Eigo (Japan)

game.description: Kiku! Kaku! Kotoba o Fuyasu! - Hajimete no Eigo Training - Eitore (Japan)

game.name: Kilari - Deviens une Star (Europe) (En,Fr,Es,It)
game.story: Kirarin Revolution : Mezase! Idol Queen est un jeu d'aventure sur DS inspiré de la série animée Kirarin Revolution. L'histoire est donc en rapport avec Kirarin qui essaye de devenir célèbre pour arriver à son but, qui est de se faire remarquer par la personne qu'elle aime. Ce titre se déroule dans un univers ouvert qui propose bon nombre de mini-jeux.

game.name: Kilari - Na-san, Mon Meilleur Ami (Europe) (Fr,Es,It)
game.story: Kilari sur Nintendo DS se déroule dans la ville natale de la jeune Kilari, qu'on peut explorer en toute liberté. Au hasard de ses déplacements, son chat, Na-san, pourra relever les défis les plus divers: pêcher des poissons, creuser, nager, accomplir diverses actions courageuses ou encore prouver la finesse de son audition. Chaque tâche accomplie avec succès renforcera la popularité de Kilari et la rapprochera de son objectif : devenir la plus grande star du Monde.

game.name: Kim Possible - Global Gemini (USA) (En,Fr)
game.story: Kim Possible is back in the ultimate adventure when Gemini escapes from jail. It's up to the player to prevent him from rebuilding his evil empire and brainwashing Global Stations around the world. Players will travel with Ron Stoppable and Rufus, the naked mole rat, to the Swiss Alps, Egypt and an island in the Pacific and bring Gemini to justice.

game.name: Kim Possible - Kimmunicator (USA) (En,Fr)
game.story: The insane Dr. Drakken and his sidekick Shego have kidnapped Kim's techno-geek friend, Wade, and it's up to you to help her rescue him! Kim goes undercover as she attempts to discover the location of Drakken's latest lair. Encounter deadly foes such as

game.name: Kimi ni Todoke - Tsutaeru Kimochi (Japan)
game.story: long-awaited new appeared to convey the feelings pure adventure game! !Easy to enjoy the popular game system in your previous work is intact!Raised given the "seed of opportunity," the water that had accumulated in Sawako by "borne in mind", an event occurs in the flowers to bloom!Story will show a variety of changes that you select in "borne in mind."Inherit the previous system, in this film in your Sawako Why greet the ending like? Even when passed from the previous work, trying to experience life in a new high school to the new season!Feel more like the person who cleared the previous work, the user will be able to experience Sawako perspective, the festival events such as our class and school change Sawako was the second year of senior high school students north hood. Let the fun and memories to make us a lot of character Sawako appeared more than last, became a sophomore.Reaction such as a rival, a classmate, Sawako growth element of the heart of school life is full of second-year sailing north hood starts dating, friendship to love! .

game.name: Kimi no Yuusha (Japan)
game.story: Kimi no Yuusha is a DS role-playing game designed for players don't have a lot of time to play RPGs. The story takes place on the continent of Midiarias, threatened by evil forces. Go on an adventure and manage a group that can reach up to ten people. The game is divided into 25 stories which have 50 mini-scenarios with decisions that can change the history in several directions, which guarantees a unique adventure to each game.

game.name: Kindaichi Shounen no Jikenbo - Akuma no Satsujin Koukai (Japan)
game.description: Kindaichi Shounen no Jikenbo - Akuma no Satsujin Koukai (Japan)

game.name: Kingdom Hearts - 358-2 Days (USA) (En,Fr)
game.story: Kingdom Hearts 358/2 Days revolves around Roxas, the "other" hero from Kingdom Hearts II. Players follow Roxas through his days among Organization XIII's ranks, unraveling the events that took place during the year that Sora was asleep, and ultimately revealing one of the Kingdom Hearts saga's most shocking secrets. Players and their friends will join Roxas, his friend Axel and the mysterious fourteenth member of Organization XIII on a journey across charming, vibrant worlds full of Square Enix's and Disney's beloved characters.

game.name: Kingdom Hearts - Re-coded (USA) (En,Fr,Es)
game.story: The game takes place after the events of Kingdom Hearts II and follows the story of Jiminy Cricket, King Mickey, Donald Duck and Goofy in Disney Castle. While organizing the records in Jiminy's journal from his travels with Sora and his friends, Jiminy Cricket's curiosity about the line "Thank Naminé" results in him finding a message that he did not write: "Their hurting will be mended when you return to end it." To investigate this message, King Mickey digitizes the contents of the journal and goes into the simulated world to investigate; awakening a virtual Data-Sora on the virtual Destiny Islands to carry out the contents of the journal to uncover the identity of those who are "hurting".

game.name: Kira Kira Pop Princess (Europe) (En,Fr,It)
game.story:
Pinky Street: Kira Kira Music Hour is a music/rhythm game where you control a dancing girl by tapping your stylus to a series of beats in time to the music displayed on the touch screen. Gamers play the game by holding the Nintendo DS as though it were a book, similar to Brain Age.
The touch screen displays the melody at the top that you must follow, and the three bars below represent the different note 'types' that you can play - either by tapping, or by sliding the stylus along the note (depending on the difficulty level). Based on the accuracy of the note press, you'll be awarded "GOOD", "KIRA²" "RAINBOW", or "MISS" if you fail to hit it.
A story mode is included, where the player progresses by completing songs and unlocking new ones for play. They also earn money, which can be used to purchase clothes and accessories for their in-game avatar to wear. There are also photo booths where the avatar can pose in a variety of ways for the camera.

game.name: Kirarin Revolution - Atsumete Change! - Cool Kira Coord (Japan)
game.description: Kirarin Revolution - Atsumete Change! - Cool Kira Coord (Japan)

game.name: Kirarin Revolution - Kira Kira Idol Audition (Japan)
game.description: Kirarin Revolution - Kira Kira Idol Audition (Japan)

game.name: Kirarin Revolution - Minna de Odorou Furi Furi Debut! (Japan)
game.description: Kirarin Revolution - Minna de Odorou Furi Furi Debut! (Japan)

game.name: Kirarin Revolution - Tsukutte Misechao! - Kime Kira Stage (Japan)
game.description: Kirarin Revolution - Tsukutte Misechao! - Kime Kira Stage (Japan)

game.name: Kirby - Canvas Curse (USA)
game.story: Your DS stylus has been infused with the power to paint! When Kirby gets turned into a ball by an evil witch, your hand-drawn rainbow paths become the only way he can find power-ups and reach the gates of each world. Draw loops to make him speed up, make ramps to jump danger, and draw walls to block laser beams and cannon blasts as you explore seven worlds packed with adventure! Get in touch: Stun enemies, break blocks, and much more - all with a touch of the stylus! Be a copycat: Tap Kirby to dash into enemies and copy their abilities. Eleven abilities in all! So many modes: Try timed challenges, take on bosses, or play simple but fun mini-games!

game.name: Kirby - Squeak Squad (USA)
game.story: Kirby - Squeak Squad is a platform game for Nintendo DS. You play the famous and adorable Kirby, who can breathe in air to inflate like a balloon and thus cross the many levels of the game while gliding. The small creature is also able to swallow its enemies and take their strength, and must stop the "Squeak Squad", a group of malicious rodents.

game.name: Kirby Mass Attack (USA) (En,Fr,Es)
game.story: Kirby: Mass Attack is a single player Side-Scrolling, Real-Time Strategy game for Nintendo DS that features both new adventure, and a new gameplay mechanic uniquely suited to the Nintendo DS. Gameplay includes the ability and necessity of controlling multiple versions of Kirby simultaneously in order to defeat enemies, solve puzzles and complete challenges.

game.name: Kirby Super Star Ultra (USA)
game.story:
Kirby's back with a bunch of fun adventures! Explore Dream Land and defeat King Dedede, tame the ferocious Dynablade, explore a huge cave, take part in a gluttonous race, vandalize Meta Knight's ship, the Halberd, explore the entire galaxy, and more!
Kirby Super Star Ultra is an updated remake of Kirby Super Star, a popular SNES game which is broken up into seven main games. In addition to those previous games, Ultra includes five new games and three new sub-games. Listed are just some of the new ones:
Revenge of the King: King Dedede wants a rematch! This game is a toughened up version of Spring Breeze, the opening game.
The Arena: Every boss that Kirby has met throughout the game, one after the other! Try to beat them all!
Meta Knightmare Ultra: Play through the first five games as Meta Knight, with his own special abilities and powers! Speed is the key!
Kirby Card Swipe: Watch the top screen, and quickly pick the correct card. Be the first to do it thrice!
Kirby on the Draw: Enemy targets pop up, tap them as they appear. Don't tap the bombs!
Snack Tracks: Eat all the food on your tracks. Don't eat the bugs, bombs or rocks!
As with the original, Ultra features a heavily featured multiplayer mode. All games can be played either co-operatively or competitively. Spring Breeze can even be played co-operatively if your friend doesn't have a copy of the game!

game.name: Kirihara Shoten Kanshuu - Daigakusei Ryoku Kentei DS (Japan)
game.description: Kirihara Shoten Kanshuu - Daigakusei Ryoku Kentei DS (Japan)

game.name: Kiwami Birei Aquarium - Sekai no Sakana to Iruka Kujira-tachi (Japan)
game.description: Kiwami Birei Aquarium - Sekai no Sakana to Iruka Kujira-tachi (Japan)

game.name: Knights in the Nightmare (USA)
game.story:
A great war once raged across the land with many a valiant knight falling on the field of battle. In the end, the evil forces have prevailed, and have since taken over and corrupted the once great kingdom. On a stormy night a Wisp is awakened by a strange armored maiden. The wisp holds the memories of the war, and is now seeking all the valiant dead to be brought back to the world of the living in order to complete their mission and take back the land that was once theirs.
Knights in the Nightmare can be loosely summed up as a Strategy RPG, but it is played like no other Strategy RPG in existence. The game is almost entirely stylus controlled on Nintendo DS, and combines the active-timer turn-based combat of a game such as Final Fantasy VI with elements of bullet-hell top-down shooters, and relies on a set of unorthodox rules for completion of its goals.
Once in the field of battle the player controls the Wisp who can cause the spirits of fallen heroes inhabiting the area to temporarily reconstitute into their physical form and do battle with monsters that now roam the land. The player can recruit those warriors permanently into their party by seeking out objects that meant something to them while they were alive.
The game features a robust character customization system that includes many classes of units, multiple jobs per each unit class, and a soul transplant system that allows the player to transfer all attributes of one player into another.

game.name: Knobel- und Denkspiele 2 (Germany)
game.story: The best selling puzzler collection returns with even more fun in 2011! Boasting over 1200 different puzzles, with favories like Sudoku, crosswords and unique offerings like Link-A-Pix and Pieceword, puzzle fans are sure to find a wealth of fun in this unprecedented collection.

game.name: Know How - Spielend um die Ecke denken (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It)
game.description: Know How - Spielend um die Ecke denken (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It)

Incarnez le joueur de votre choix et alternez avec le gant et la batte. Diversifiez votre jeu et devenez l'élément clé pour remporter la victoire.

game.name: Koh-Lanta - Survie dans la Jungle! (France)
game.story: Voici une nouvelle aventure de Koh-Lanta sur DS. Cette fois, vous survivez dans la jungle sauvage. Dans le même principe que la série télé du même nom vous participez à la vie en groupe, formez des alliances et participez aux épreuves pour remporter la partie.

game.name: Koisuru Purin! - Koi wa Daibouken! Dr. Kanmi no Yabou! (Japan)
game.description: Koisuru Purin! - Koi wa Daibouken! Dr. Kanmi no Yabou! (Japan)

game.name: Kokoro ni Shimiru - Mouhitsu de Kaku - Aida Mitsuo DS (Japan)
game.description: Kokoro ni Shimiru - Mouhitsu de Kaku - Aida Mitsuo DS (Japan)

game.name: Kokoro o Yasumeru - Otona no Nurie DS 2 (Japan)
game.description: Kokoro o Yasumeru - Otona no Nurie DS 2 (Japan)
game.story: Paint by DS Classic Masterpieces is a digital colouring book that allows you to recreate legendary works such as Leonardo da Vinci's Mona Lisa and Vincent van Gogh's Sun flowers. There are over 30 intricate and relaxing colouring challenges for you to complete, plus a variety of fun mini games to enjoy.

game.name: Konami Classics Series - Arcade Hits (USA) (En,Ja)
game.story: Konami Classics Series: Arcade Hits compiles 15 of the most memorable quarter-munching arcade hits of all-time on the Nintendo DS™ system. Experience the sights, sounds and magic of classic Konami arcade games arcades and relive your arcade memories with a full collection of in-game music and even send demo versions of each game to your friends to share in the fun. No quarters necessary...

game.name: Konductra (USA)
game.story:
Konductra is a touch-based game where players can challenge one another via the Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection and battle head-to-head by matching colorful tiles and attempting to block the opponent’s progress. Players can square off against the computer, complete challenging tasks, or rack up high scores to practice for matches against the greatest puzzle masters online.
Konductra challenges players to create and destroy lines with colored tiles to either earn points or attack an opponent. Four game modes are offered, including Task, Score, VS. CPU, and VS. Human. In both versus modes, the objective is to beat the opponent by filling up the rival’s board as quickly as possible by destroying lines on the player’s own board and sending them to the opponent’s board. Gamers destroy lines by matching tiles and using the stylus to trace from like colored conductors running along the four edges of the screen.

game.name: Kore de Haji o Kakanai - Ashita Tsukaeru DS Business Manner (Japan)
game.description: Kore de Haji o Kakanai - Ashita Tsukaeru DS Business Manner (Japan)

game.name: Korg DS-10 Synthesizer (USA)
game.story: KORG, maker of some of the world's finest musical instruments, takes their legendary MS-10 synthesizer, adds tons of modern features, and combines it with the accessibility of the Nintendo DS Touch Screen. No effort was spared in creating the awesomely portable and powerful, yet incredibly easy to use, music creation software for your Nintendo DS.

game.name: Korg DS-10+ Synthesizer (USA) (NDSi Enhanced)
game.story: KORG, maker of some of the world's finest musical instruments, takes their legendary MS-10 synthesizer, adds tons of modern features, and combines it with the accessibility of the Nintendo DS Touch Screen. No effort was spared in creating the awesomely portable and powerful, yet incredibly easy to use, music creation software for your Nintendo DS.

game.name: Korg M01 Music Workstation (Japan) (En)
game.story: A revamped version on the 2008 synthesizer simulation, Korg DS-10 Synthesizer Plus gives aspiring beat-makers more options to create and mix their own unique songs. As in the original game, players can choose from pre-set templates or create their own synth and drum lines by using the onscreen keyboard, drum pads, and 16-step sequencer. Synthesizer Plus also allows custom track modulation, track mutes, and parameter edits in real-time, and post-production options such as a full-featured mixer, pattern chaining, and multiple effects are once again available for added polish. DSi owners get even more features, as options for the drum machine (one-part to two-part), the analog synth simulator (two-part to four-part), and the number of simultaneous sounds (six to twelve) all double. And just as in the original version, wireless gamers can once again link as many as eight DS units together for multiplayer ensemble performances in which each game acts as a single instrument, and players can also exchange songs and session data with one another.

game.name: Kou Rate Ura Mahjong Retsuden - Mukoubuchi - Goburei, Last Desu ne (Japan)
game.description: Kou Rate Ura Mahjong Retsuden - Mukoubuchi - Goburei, Last Desu ne (Japan)

game.name: Kou-chan no Shiawase! Kantan! Oryouri Recipe (Japan)
game.description: Kou-chan no Shiawase! Kantan! Oryouri Recipe (Japan)

game.description: Kouchuu Ouja Mushi King - Greatest Champion e no Michi 2 (Japan)

game.description: Kouchuu Ouja Mushi King - Greatest Champion e no Michi DS (Japan)

game.name: Kouchuu Ouja Mushi King Super Collection (Japan)
game.description: Kouchuu Ouja Mushi King Super Collection (Japan)

game.name: Kouenji Joshi Soccer 2 - Koi wa Nebagiba Kouenji (Japan)
game.description: Kouenji Joshi Soccer 2 - Koi wa Nebagiba Kouenji (Japan)

game.name: Koukou Juken Eitango Get Through 1900 - Eitan Zamurai DS (Japan) (Rev 1)
game.description: Koukou Juken Eitango Get Through 1900 - Eitan Zamurai DS (Japan) (Rev 1)

game.name: Kumatanchi (Japan)
game.story: Kumatanchi is a DS life-simulation game that lets you take care of an animal that looks like a human, except for a few details like its ears which resemble those of an animal. You will have to help him do many activities such as training him every day, feeding him, teaching him things while following his story. Be careful, the game continues even after the console is turned off!

game.name: Kung Fu Panda (USA)
game.story:
In this game based on the 2008 DreamWorks movie of the same name, the player is Po the panda. Po finds out that the best kung fu masters have been captured by the evil Tai Lung. Po is fat, loves to eat dumplings, and is pretty slow and clumsy at kung fu, so he is shocked when he is asked to go rescue them. Although some elements have been changed, the game's theme is largely identical to the movie and linear in design.
Po's journey consists of finding the five kung fu masters, mastering a new skill that they teach him, then continuing on to find Tai Lung. This game is a 3rd-person side-scroller with frequent use of the touch screen and seems largely based on the mechanics and engine employed in the DS version of Spider-Man 3.
Po's movements are controlled through the D-pad while attacks are performed by swiping the styles on the touch screen. These are also used to throw objects and perform the learned special moves. Most of the gameplay consists of hand to hand combat with enemies, and traversing levels by consulting your top screen mini-map. New moves are learned gradually and there are also small puzzle elements where Po needs to interact with the environment to progress.

game.name: Kung Fu Panda - Legendary Warriors (USA) (En,Fr)
game.story: Po and the Furious Five are back in an all-new, totally awesome Kung Fu adventure that picks up where the movie left off! Use the stylus to unleash your inner Kung Fu master and battle the vengeful Tai Lung! Connect wirelessly to the Wii to unlock exclusive Wii multiplayer characters.

game.name: Kung Fu Panda 2 (USA) (En,Fr) (VKUY) (NDSi Enhanced)
game.story: On Nintendo DS, Kung Fu Panda 2 will allow players to command Po using the stylus and unleash awesome kung fu moves against enemies alongside his friends and fellow kung fu masters, the Furious Five: Tigress, Monkey, Crane, Viper and Mantis. In addition, the Nintendo DS version offers an addictive card game called "Five-Card Fu," which can be played either alone or with a friend. The game is played on a 3x3 grid which contains nine squares. To get started, the player must select five cards from their in-game library and place one card in one of the nine squares. Each card will have a number ranging from one through nine on each side of the card. In order to win, the player must strategize on which square they will occupy first as well as which card to use. Once the player places a card in a square, the opponent will have to place a card on an adjacent square that beats the numerical value of the card the first player placed. The player that occupies the grid with the highest numerical value wins.

game.name: Kung Zhu (USA)
game.story: Action! Adventure! The Kung Zhu Warriors have sworn to protect the Zhu artifacts, but now they have been stolen! Your mission: restore peace and serenity and recover the missing artifacts!

game.name: Kunitori Zunou Battle - Nobunaga no Yabou (Japan)
game.description: Kunitori Zunou Battle - Nobunaga no Yabou (Japan)

game.name: Kurayami no Hate de Kimi o Matsu (Japan)
game.description: Kurayami no Hate de Kimi o Matsu (Japan)
game.story: During the middle of an outdoor hiking event at your school you suddenly get sick. It was decided that you should go back to camp by bus along with the student council president Aoi Mio, your childhood friend Sakuraba Katsumi, members of the tennis club Honami Yousuke and Akiyama Tomo, a student from another school Kazano Tarou, your teacher Kousaka Takahiko, and the trainee teacher Mikomoto Naoki. However along the way you met with an accident. When you came to, you and everyone else on the bus were trapped in an unknown abandoned school. There you found a letter from a person calling themself "Death Mask". It read "If you do not escape from this school according to my orders you will meet with death."

game.name: Kuroshitsuji - Phantom & Ghost (Japan)
game.story: A Nintendo DS game released as part of the Kuroshitsuji universe. The story is original and takes place between Chapter 13 and Chapter 14. The basic plot is that the Phantomhives are sent to the haunted Brighton mansion by Queen Victoria because of the recent sightings of ghosts on the property, which she would like him to resolve. Manga creator Yana Toboso oversaw the story and created new characters for the game.

game.name: KuruKuru Princess - Tokimeki Figure - Mezase! Vancouver (Japan)
game.description: KuruKuru Princess - Tokimeki Figure - Mezase! Vancouver (Japan)
game.story: In Imagine Figure Skater, players live the life of a champion who needs to balance her life between training, school and friends. Girls take on the role of a professional figure skater and use the stylus to perform jumps, spins and a variety of skating combinations.

game.name: Kurupoto - Cool Cool Stars (USA)
game.story: The stars have fallen from the sky! The only thing that can help the stars regain their power is the haloes that were scattered all over Kurupoto Island when they fell. As a star worshipper, it is up to you, the Kurupoto, to free these haloes from the puzzles they are stuck in and get your beloved stars shining in the sky once more.

game.name: Kutsushita Nyanko - Shiroi Kutsushita o Haita Neko to Kurashi Hajimemashita. (Japan)
game.description: Kutsushita Nyanko - Shiroi Kutsushita o Haita Neko to Kurashi Hajimemashita. (Japan)

game.name: Kuukan Zukei - Hirameki Training - Kuutore (Japan)
game.story: Hirameki Training Ku Tore sur DS est une cartouche ludo-éducative qui propose de nombreux mini-jeux et autres puzzles.

game.name: Kyouryuu Ikusei Battle RPG - Kyouryuu Monster (Japan)
game.description: Kyouryuu Ikusei Battle RPG - Kyouryuu Monster (Japan)

game.name: L - The Prologue to Death Note - Rasen no Trap (Japan)
game.description: L - The Prologue to Death Note - Rasen no Trap (Japan)

game.name: L.O.L. (USA)
game.story: LOL is the ultimate party game that allows players' imaginations to run free. Since LOL has no rules, there's nothing to limit a player's creativity. The game's concept is simple; the host thinks up a challenge for the other players and then everyone battles it out by drawing, picking, or writing the best answer. When everyone has finished and submitted their answers, voting begins. The one with the most votes wins! Remember, if the game is boring, then you are boring!

game.name: Labyrinth (USA)
game.story:
Labyrinth is the sequel to a SNES game called On the Ball. The object of the game is to manipulate a ball through a maze to the checkered goal line. To do this, players must rotate the level around to navigate their way through obstacles. The ball is constantly falling towards the bottom of the screen, ignoring whatever direction the maze is facing.
There are two ways to control the ball. The first is by using the L and R Shoulder buttons to rotate the maze left or right. The other method is to rotate the maze map on the touch screen using the stylus. Players can also briefly surround their ball with lightning which will shatter certain blocks. It's also possible to customize your ball - you can increase or decrease the weight of your ball, as well as change the colour and material it is made from.
In addition to the single player mode, Labyrinth also features a Single-Cart Multiplayer mode. In this mode, up to four players can take part in making their way through the maze. The first player to reach the goal is the winner.

game.name: Lalaloopsy (USA) (En,Fr)
game.story: Lalaloopsy delivers hours of fun as exciting new friendships blossom. Players will become best friends with the dolls by doing arts and crafts together and then giving those crafts as gifts. Making friends and exploring Lalaloopsy Land will lead the most adventuresome to bigger thrills and enchanting discoveries. There is always fun to be had in the Lalaloopsy world, itÃ¯Â¿Â½s Sew Magical! Sew Cute!

game.name: Lalaloopsy - Carnival of Friends (USA)
game.story: Peanut Big Top is throwing the biggest Silly Funhouse carnival in Lalaloopsy Land for all to enjoy, including a special treat at the end! It's up to you to find all of the Lalaloopsy friends at the carnival to reveal the BIG surprise!

game.name: Lapin Malin - J'Apprends a Lire et a Ecrire (France)
game.description: Lapin Malin - J'Apprends a Lire et a Ecrire (France)
game.story: In this game you're learning to Read and Write with Clever Rabbit on DS, discover an edutainment game for the little ones. Find the magic cards stolen by pirates thanks to mini-games highlighting a syllabic method of learning to read and write. The stylus is used to allow the little ones to draw their first letters.

game.name: Lara Croft Tomb Raider - Legend (USA) (En,Fr,De,Es,It)
game.story: Tomb Raider: Legend revives the athletic, intelligent and entertaining adventurer who won the hearts and minds of gamers worldwide. Lara comes alive with intricately animated expressions, moves and abilities. An arsenal of modern equipment, such as a magnetic grappling device, binoculars, frag grenades, personal lighting device and communications equipment, allows gamers to experience tomb raiding as never before.

game.name: Last Bullet (Japan)
game.story: Last Bullet is an adventure game where the player plays Karine, a Japanese schoolgirl. College girl, okay. Japanese, okay. But Karine is also a sharpshooter!
