Need for Speed Carbon delivers the next generation of customization giving you the power to design and tweak your crew's cars in every way using the ground-breaking new Autosculpt technology. Represent your car class, your crew, and your turf in Need for Speed Carbon, the next revolution in racing games.

game.name: Negima! - Chou Mahora Taisen - Kattoiin, Keiyaku Shikkou Dechaimasuu (Japan)
game.description: Negima! - Chou Mahora Taisen - Kattoiin, Keiyaku Shikkou Dechaimasuu (Japan)

game.name: Negima! - Chou Mahora Taisen Two - Checkiin, Zenin Shuugou! - Yappari Onsen Kichaimashitaa (Japan)
game.description: Negima! - Chou Mahora Taisen Two - Checkiin, Zenin Shuugou! - Yappari Onsen Kichaimashitaa (Japan)

game.name: Neighbours from Hell (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It)
game.story: The reality TV show of neighborly nastiness and community commotion moves on to the next round. The neighbor from hell wants to enjoy an undeserved holiday - reason enough for Woody and the camera team to sneak along onto the cruise liner to make the nasty neighbour's holiday a living hell. This time, the neighbor's mum has joined him, and she is taking good care of her baby. Get the neighbor from hell into his mum's and fellow travellers' bad books, play tricks on him and give free reign to your vengeance.

game.name: Neopets Puzzle Adventure (USA)
game.story:
Neopets Puzzle Adventure offers players a new take on puzzle adventure games. Choose one of twelve Neopets and challenge your opponents in the land of Neopia in one of several puzzle minigames, including a power-up filled reimagining of the classic games Reversi and Go.
Other minigames include a touchscreen gesture shooting gallery, a memory puzzle, and a colorful brick-breaking game. During the adventure, players acquire new PetPets, unlock over 100 missions, and redeem codes to unlock virtual items at the Neopets website.
Neopets Puzzle Adventure also features head-to-head multiplayer.

game.name: Neoromance Game - Harukanaru Toki no Naka de - Yume no Ukihashi (Japan)
game.description: Neoromance Game - Harukanaru Toki no Naka de - Yume no Ukihashi (Japan)
game.story: Sometime during the games' stories, the presiding god of the dream world is infuriated when an unprecedented vengeful spirit infestation threatens his realm. He abducts the souls of the dreaming three White Dragon Priestesses and their Eight Guardians —whose negligence he deems to be the main cause of the invasion— to demand their eternal servitude to him. They are rescued by the god's younger brother who offers his mansion as hospice. With his help, they seek to restore order to the dream world and rescue their captured comrades for a safe return to their rightful eras. At the start of each game, the player must pick one protagonist to use. Whoever they pick decides their possible romance routes. Players can read broad introductions for each protagonist's era or quickly skip to selecting a guardian. Regardless of the player's protagonist and selected individual, their starting team of characters will always be the same. Variations of the beginning sequence occur based on their team composition.

game.name: Nervous Brickdown (USA) (En,Fr,De,Es,It)
game.story:
At its core Nervous Brickdown is a Arkanoid-clone and the first ten levels feature the familiar gameplay of using a horizontally moving paddle at the bottom and a ball to destroy bricks at the top of the screen. But each of the ten worlds (divided into 9 levels and one boss fight) feature a different type of gameplay.
In the second stage the player needs to draw the paddle on the screen himself to knock the ball against ink blots. Depending on the form of the drawn paddle, the ball will bounce off differently. And to spice things up even more, the paddle isn't restricted to just horizontal movement anymore but can instead be freely moved around at the bottom of the screen. Other stages require the player to move through a haunted house and kill ghosts by blowing into the microphone or contain a laser beam which increases it's speed.
By playing successfully through the levels, the player unlocks bonuses which range from extra lives to the ability to change the trajectory of the ball by blowing into the microphone.
The game also features a multiplayer mode for two players in which the ball changes into the player's paddle color so it will only bounce off the paddle with the corresponding color.

game.name: Net Ghost Pipopa - Pipopa x DS@Daibouken!!! (Japan)
game.description: Net Ghost Pipopa - Pipopa x DS@Daibouken!!! (Japan)

game.name: Neves (USA) (En,Ja)
game.story: NEVES requires the player to combine seven wooden blocks to form specific figures ranging from simple items like a sword or key to more complicated ones such as birds or airplanes. Utilizing the touch screen features unique to the Nintendo DS, NEVES offers a challenging but relaxing puzzle experience to a broad audience of gamers. Puzzles can be as simple as a sword or as complex as a battleship.

game.name: New Carnival Games (USA) (En,Fr,Es) (NDSi Enhanced)
game.story: A 2010 edition of one of the most popular gaming franchises for families, New Carnival Games will include 30 new games and attractions, including Pitch-A-Plate, Bottle Stand-Up, Fish Bowl Bounce, Gold Rush Alley Ball, Bumper Cars and Haunted House

game.name: New International Track & Field (USA) (En,Fr,De,Es,It)
game.story:
New International Track & Field is a 21st century update of the NES game that features 24 events to compete in:
1. 100 Metre Sprint
2. Long Jump
3. 110 Metre Hurdles
4. Skeet Shooting
5. Weightlifting
6. 400 Metre Distance
7. Steeplechase
8. Archery
9. Javelin
10. Cycling
11. Triple Jump
12. Hammer
13. Discus
14. Shot Put
15. Breaststroke
16. 100 Metre Backstroke
17. Pole Vault
18. High Dive
19. Double Trap Shooting
20. Springboard
21. Vault
22. Rowing
23. High Jump
24. Horizontal
There are 18 different athletes to choose from, 10 original characters created for the game and 8 classic Konami characters:
1. Sparkster 2. Pyramid Head 3. Evil Rose 4. Frogger 5. Simon Belmot 6. Pentaro 7. Solid Snake 8. Power Pro-kun
The gameplay consists of using the stylus pen in various movements on the bottom screen when prompted during the game. If the player chooses, they can also use the D-pad and buttons instead and can also utilize the DS' microphone to shout encouragements to their athlete, giving them a better chance at succeeding at their event.
Players can also customize their characters through various equipment and costumes by completing certain objectives in the game and features online capabilities, allowing four opponents to face each other in online tournaments as well as track their stats on worldwide leaderboards.

game.name: New Shikakui Atama o Maruku Suru. DS - Kanzen Seiha Ketteiban (Japan)
game.description: New Shikakui Atama o Maruku Suru. DS - Kanzen Seiha Ketteiban (Japan)

game.name: New Super Mario Bros. (USA)
game.story:
In an all new 2D side-scrolling adventure, Mario and Luigi return after nearly fifteen years. The first traditional Mario Bros. game since Super Mario World.
The character models are rendered in real time 3D, allowing for a far greater number of moves ever before seen in a Mario Bros. title. Also as the game is on DS, the touch screen allows players to store an additional power-up and view the distance still to go in a level.

game.name: New York Times Crosswords, The (USA)
game.story: One thousand New York Times crossword puzzles available for play on the DS. Features include "puzzle week" which unlocks extra hard brain-buster puzzles when you complete a week of puzzles, random puzzle, and the ability to choose any puzzle by day. Interface is simple use of touch screen (character recognition or qwerty keyboard).

game.name: New Zealand Story Revolution (USA) (En,Fr,Es)
game.story:
The game is a remake of the classic platformer The New Zealand Story. As in the original, the player takes control of Tiki the Kiwi, who sets out to rescue his friends from the clutches of an evil leopard seal. The goal of each level is thus to reach the cage of an imprisoned Kiwi bird and free it. To make it through the levels, Tiki is equipped with a bow the get rid of the constantly respawning enemy. The remake features some new mechanics, like a double jump and a different health system (Tiki dies at one hit in the old game) and several mini games played on the touch screen such as find the differences. In the normal game mode the bottom screen functions as a map of the current level. There are two difficulty levels.
The game features four player multi-player in wireless mode.

game.name: Ni Hao, Kai-Lan - New Year's Celebration (USA)
game.description: Ni Hao, Kai-Lan - New Year's Celebration (USA)
game.story: Ni Hao! Get ready to enjoy the greatest Chinese New Year celebration ever with Kai-lan and her friends! Join in the fun with Kai-lan, Rintoo, Tolee, HoHo, LuLu, and YeYe as you help them craft paper lanterns, cook Chinese dumplings, march in a parade, play in a band, and much, much more!

game.name: Ni no Kuni - Shikkoku no Madoushi (Japan)
game.description: Ni no Kuni - Shikkoku no Madoushi (Japan)
game.story: Ni no Kuni : Shikkoku no Madoushi is a role playing game on Nintendo DS which where you play as a thirteen year old child responsible for the death of his mother. One day a fairy appears to him and gives him a book which should lead him into a mysterious world called Ni no Kuni. In this world, which is actually a parallel world, the little boy discovers that his mother is still alive there. He will therefore decide to save her from her fatal fate.

game.name: Nickelodeon Dora and Friends' - Fantastic Flight (Europe) (En,Fr,Es,Nl)
game.description: Nickelodeon Dora and Friends' - Fantastic Flight (Europe) (En,Fr,Es,Nl)
game.story:
Big math heroes Milli, Geo and Bo and explorers Dora and Babouche team up to find the missing pieces of their magical airship, which must take them on a wonderful journey into the clouds with all your friends from Nickelodeon.
Practice number recognition, problem solving, completing sets of patterns, and more in this unique adventure.

game.name: Nickelodeon Team - Umizoomi (USA)
game.story: They're mini, they're mighty, and they're built for math! Now you can join Team Umizoomi, and go on a mighty math adventure! Take a ride in the Umicar with Milli, Geo and Bot to help them rescue seahorses, build a submarine, or repair a rocket so it can blast off! With you on their team, Team Umizoomi can do anything!

game.name: Nicktoons - Attack of the Toybots (USA)
game.story: The evil Professor Calamitous is at it again! But this time he's gone too far. He has created evil robots that look just like our Nicktoons heroes! Now, SpongeBob, Jimmy Neutron, Danny Phantom, Timmy Turner, and Tak must stop them and the Professor no matter what it takes. By using new attacks, and awesome mech suits, now you can help our heroes stop the evil professor before he wreaks havoc everywhere!

game.name: Nicktoons - Battle for Volcano Island (USA)
game.story: Join SpongeBob, Timmy Tuner, and Danny Phantom in an all out battle to stop the evil Mawgu from taking control of Volcano Island!

game.name: Nicktoons MLB (USA) (Rev 1)
game.story: A dugout full of Nicktoons including SpongeBob, ZIM, Dudley Puppy, Fanboy, Chum Chum, Aang and more team up with superstars from all 30 MLB club in this epic baseball showdown!

game.name: Nicktoons Unite! (USA)
game.story:
Nicktoons Unite! is a 3D person action platformer. Danny Phantom, SpongeBob SquarePants, Timmy Turner and Jimmy Neutron, all known from animated TV series, are brought together to face enemies from their respective worlds.
You can play as any one of the four characters and instantaneously swap at any point in the game. Each character has his own special ability. Danny can wall jump and pass through certain walls. Spongebob can blow bubbles and float in a bubble. Timmy Turner can move quickly and freeze enemies with his special ability. Jimmy Neutron has a gun and a rocket pack.
The game is an action platformer, hosting a standard fare of shootable bad guys, platforms, switches, puzzles and boss fights.

game.name: Night at the Museum - Battle of the Smithsonian - The Video Game (USA)
game.description: Night at the Museum - Battle of the Smithsonian - The Video Game (USA)
game.story: Get ready for a story so epic it could only unfold in the corridors of the world's largest museum--the Smithsonian Institution. Museum guard-turned entrepreneur Larry Daley discovers that his favorite exhibits, and some of his best friends, from New York's Natural History Museum are being shipped off to the archives at the Smithsonian. Larry gets a distress call from the miniature cowboy, Jedediah, reporting that Egyptian ruler Kahmunrah and a trio of heinous henchmen--namely Ivan the Terrible, Napoleon and Al Capone--are plotting to take over the museum, then the world. Speeding to the nation's capitol, Larry is clearly in over his head. But with some impressive new pals, including the irrepressible Amelia Earhart, along with familiar friends Teddy Roosevelt and Octavius, Larry will stop at nothing to restore the Smithsonian before dawn.

game.name: Nihon Keizai Shinbunsha Kanshuu - Shiranai Mama dewa Son wo Suru - 'Mono ya Okane no Shikumi' DS (Japan)
game.description: Nihon Keizai Shinbunsha Kanshuu - Shiranai Mama dewa Son wo Suru - 'Mono ya Okane no Shikumi' DS (Japan)

game.name: Nihon Pro Mahjong Kishikai Kanshuu - Pro ni Naru Mahjong DS (Japan)
game.description: Nihon Pro Mahjong Kishikai Kanshuu - Pro ni Naru Mahjong DS (Japan)

game.name: Nihongo Bunshou Nouryoku Kentei Kyoukai Kyouryoku - Tadashii Nihongo DS (Japan)
game.description: Nihongo Bunshou Nouryoku Kentei Kyoukai Kyouryoku - Tadashii Nihongo DS (Japan)

game.name: Nihongo Kentei Iinkai Kounin - Nihongo Kentei DS (Japan)
game.description: Nihongo Kentei Iinkai Kounin - Nihongo Kentei DS (Japan)

game.name: Nine Hours, Nine Persons, Nine Doors (USA)
game.description: Nine Hours, Nine Persons, Nine Doors (USA)
game.story: Junpei, a fairly normal college student finds himself involved in a deadly conspiracy that he couldn't have possibly imagined. He awakes aboard an old passenger ferry, dazed and confused he stumbles around the room trying to reclaim his memories. First thing he noticed was a number roughly drawn on the cabin's door. A bright red number 5. Junpei's memory then returned and he remembered what happened right before becoming unconscious! A mysterious person with a gas mask crossed his mind. He remembered the haunting words he spoke, I'm gonna make you play the game, the Nonary Game' the game of life or death".

game.name: Ninja Captains (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It)
game.story: Ninja Captains is a fun DS party-game that features little ninjas through twenty different activities around the globe.

game.name: Ninja Gaiden - Dragon Sword (USA)
game.story: This action-adventure title is presented in a third person, pseudo-3D manner, meaning all the game-models are rendered in full 3D, but the world the player travels around in is pre-rendered. When played, the Nintendo DS is held sideways, as in Hotel Dusk: Room 215 and Brain Age: Train Your Brain in Minutes a Day!. The left screen shows the area map, while the right displays the main gameplay, when set for right-handed play, and reverse when set for left-handed play. Set six months after Ninja Gaiden, Ryu Hayabusa has rebuilt the Hayabusa Village. When fellow villager and kunoichi, Momiji, is kidnapped by the Black Spider Ninja Clan, he is forced to find her, while uncovering the secrets behind the mysterious Dark Dragonstones and their relation to the Dragon Lineage

game.name: Ninja Reflex (USA) (En,Fr,De,Es,It)
game.story:
Ninja Reflex is a game to test the players reaction speed and timing. The mini-games consist of catching flies with chopsticks, catching Koi fish from a pond along with training with martial arts weapons of the shuriken, samurai sword and nunchaku. Completing these tasks will earn the player a digital belt from their own personal sensai.
There is also a meditation method where the game will guide the player to calm their breathing and relaxing their muscles. It can support up to four-players on a multi-player mode, letting players challenge each other to see who has faster reaction times.

game.name: Ninjatown (USA)
game.story:
Ninjatown is a family-friendly tower defense game for the Nintendo DS that features the artwork and characters of ex-EGM editor Shawn Smith's "Shawnimals" universe. In the game, players must build Ninja Huts at key spots along a set pathway to defend each of the game's 36 levels from the invading forces of Mr. Demon. Players can build up to eight different kinds of Ninja Huts, each kind containing its own category of Ninja, from Wasabi pea-shooting Sniper Ninjas to bearded Mountain Ninjas.
There are also a variety of "Ol' Master Ninja Powers" that can help the player in a pinch. These range from blowing into the DS microphone to push enemies backwards with a gust of wind to tapping enemies on screen in a short period of time in order to deal extra damage to them.
The game is divided into 9 "districts", each containing 3 standard tower defense maps and 1 boss map. Each level in the game takes about 10-15 minutes to complete, with the full game clocking in at around 6-8 hours.

game.name: Nintama Rantarou - Gakunen Taikousen Puzzle! no Dan (Japan)
game.description: Nintama Rantarou - Gakunen Taikousen Puzzle! no Dan (Japan)

game.name: Nintama Rantarou - Nintama no Tame no Ninjutsu Training (Japan)
game.description: Nintama Rantarou - Nintama no Tame no Ninjutsu Training (Japan)

game.name: Nintendo Zone Wireless Distribution Box DS Card (World) (Rev 1)
game.description: Nintendo Zone Wireless Distribution Box DS Card (World) (Rev 1)

game.name: Nintendogs - Best Friends (USA)
game.story:
Nintendogs lets you take care of virtual pets (dogs, obviously) on your Nintendo DS. You can train your puppies by speaking commands into the microphone, pat the pooch with the stylus, play games like as "fetch" with a Frisbee, buy toys, food, and accessories, and take part in competitions to win trophies.
If there are other Nintendo DS users with Nintendogs nearby with both of you in "Bark Mode", you can link the games wirelessly and see both dogs on the same screen.
You initially only have 6 (US/EU), 5 (JP) of the 18 (US/EU), 15 (JP) breeds available when you start playing the game (the six breeds being determined by which version of the game you buy), but as you progress, you unlock more breeds and items to buy. If you connect with another user that has another breed of dog not available to you then their dog's breed will be unlocked for you.
The available versions to purchase are:
Japanese Versions:
1. Chihuahua & Friends: Beagle, Cavalier King Charles Spaniel, Chihuahua, Labrador Retriever, Shih Tzu. 2. Miniature Dachshund & Friends: German Shepherd, Miniature Dachshund, Miniature Schnauzer, Pug, Yorkshire Terrier. 3. Shiba & Friends: Miniature Pinscher, Pembroke Welsh Corgi, Shetland Sheepdog, Shiba Inu, Toy Poodle.
North American and European Versions:
1. Chihuahua & Friends: Boxer, Cavalier King Charles Spaniel, Chihuahua, German Shepherd, Shetland Sheepdog, Yorkshire Terrier. 4. Dachshund & Friends: Beagle, Golden Retriever, Miniature Dachshund, Pug, Shih Tzu, Siberian Husky. 5. Lab & Friends: Labrador Retriever, Miniature Pinscher, Miniature Schnauzer, Pembroke Welsh Corgi, Shiba Inu, Toy Poodle. 6. Best Friends Version (North America - bundled with DS): Beagle, German Shepherd, Golden Retriever, Labrador Retriever, Miniature Dachshund, Yorkshire Terrier. 7. Dalmatian & Friends: Dalmatian, Boxer, German Shepherd, Golden Retriever, Yorkshire Terrier, Beagle.
In addition to all the breeds listed above, there are two more breeds that can be unlocked through various ways.

game.name: Nintendogs - Chihuahua & Friends (USA)
game.story: With Nintendogs, you can put a puppy inside your Nintendo DS. Pick from multiple breeds, ranging from Labradors to Chihuahuas, and then take care of and train the puppy using the touch screen and microphone. If you train your puppy well enough, you can compete in dog shows and agility contests to unlock other items and puppy breeds.

game.name: Nintendogs - Dachshund & Friends (USA)
game.story: With Nintendogs, you can put a puppy inside your Nintendo DS. Pick from multiple breeds, ranging from Labradors to Chihuahuas, and then take care of and train the puppy using the touch screen and microphone. If you train your puppy well enough, you can compete in dog shows and agility contests to unlock other items and puppy breeds.

game.name: Nintendogs - Dalmatian & Friends (USA)
game.story: With Nintendogs, you can put a puppy inside your Nintendo DS. Pick from multiple breeds, ranging from Labradors to Dalmatians, and then take care of and train the puppy using the touch screen and microphone. If you train your puppy well enough, you can compete in dog shows and agility contests to unlock other items and puppy breeds.

game.name: Nintendogs - Lab & Friends (USA, Australia)
game.story: With Nintendogs, you can put a puppy inside your Nintendo DS. Pick from multiple breeds, ranging from Labradors to Chihuahuas, and then take care of and train the puppy using the touch screen and microphone. If you train your puppy well enough, you can compete in dog shows and agility contests to unlock other items and puppy breeds.

game.name: Nippon Futsal League Kounin - Minna no DS Futsal (Japan)
game.description: Nippon Futsal League Kounin - Minna no DS Futsal (Japan)

game.name: Nippon Shuzan Renmei Kanshuu - Itsudemo Soroban DS (Japan)
game.description: Nippon Shuzan Renmei Kanshuu - Itsudemo Soroban DS (Japan)

game.name: Nippon Suugaku Kentei Kyoukai Kounin - Suken DS - Otona ga Tokenai! Kodomo no Sansuu (Japan) (Rev 1)
game.description: Nippon Suugaku Kentei Kyoukai Kounin - Suken DS - Otona ga Tokenai! Kodomo no Sansuu (Japan) (Rev 1)

game.name: Nodame Cantabile (Japan)
game.story: Based on the manga and the corresponding anime, Nodame Cantabile was released as a music rythm game exclusively for the japanese market. The entertaining story of an ambitious conductor is told on the top screen of the Nintendo DS handheld, while the bottom screen is mainly used during the tasks, namely for tapping in rythm of the beat with the stylus pen. Amongst various classical pieces there are also some works, which already have been featured in the anime series and therefore also have a high recognition value for fans.

game.name: Nodame Cantabile - Tanoshii Ongaku no Jikan Desu (Japan)
game.description: Nodame Cantabile - Tanoshii Ongaku no Jikan Desu (Japan)

game.name: Noddy in Toyland (Europe) (En,Fr)
game.story: Oui-Oui: Big Party in Toy Land for Nintendo DS is an educational game for very young children. Using the marvelous world of Oui-Oui as its theme, the game contains some 15 activities, available in several levels of difficulty, to awaken their curiosity, with a particular focus on the foundations for learning to read.

game.name: Nora to Toki no Koubou - Kiri no Mori no Majo (Japan)
game.description: Nora to Toki no Koubou - Kiri no Mori no Majo (Japan)
game.story: Nora to Koku no Koubou: Kiri no Mori no Majo tells the story of a young girl called Nora who is a novice Time Alchemist. Whilst on an adventure on the Forest she is mistaken for a witch and in order to clear her name, she must befriend and help the people of Temperina and investigate the truth behind the stories of the witch of the mist forest.

game.name: Nori Nori Rilakkuma - Hit Song Ongakusai (Japan)
game.description: Nori Nori Rilakkuma - Hit Song Ongakusai (Japan)

game.name: Norimono Oukoku DS - You! Unten Shichainayo! (Japan)
game.description: Norimono Oukoku DS - You! Unten Shichainayo! (Japan)

game.name: Nostalgia (USA)
game.story: Set in an alternate-reality version of 19th-century Earth, Nostalgia casts you as Eddie, a headstrong Londoner who amasses a group of memorable companions to traverse the world in his steampunk-inspired zeppelin. As you navigate the open skies, you'll explore mysterious foreign locales, slay all manner of fantastical enemies, complete a variety of thrilling quests, and ultimately, save the world from unfathomable evil.

game.name: Nounai Aesthe IQ Suppli DS 2 - Sukkiri King Ketteisen (Japan)
game.description: Nounai Aesthe IQ Suppli DS 2 - Sukkiri King Ketteisen (Japan)

game.name: Nouvelles Aventures de T'choupi et Ses Amis, Les (France)
game.description: Nouvelles Aventures de T'choupi et Ses Amis, Les (France)
game.story: The New Adventures of T'choupi et ses Amis is a compilation of mini-games for toddlers on DS. In the countryside, at the sea or in the mountains, we find T'choupi in around fifteen colorful and easy-to-use events. Many souvenir photos will reward the most skilful and the most persistent of gamers.

game.name: Nova Usagi no Game de Ryuugaku! DS (Japan)
game.description: Nova Usagi no Game de Ryuugaku! DS (Japan)

game.name: Nursery Mania (USA)
game.story:
Step Into the Worldful and Challenging World of Childcare!
Operate a nursery and take care of your very own darling baby! Experience the endless rewards of caring for a child in this babysitting-inspired game for Nintendo DS!
- Engage in childcare activities such as cleaning, feeding and playingnn- Keep your baby happy with a range of fun gamesnn- "Accessorize" your baby with diapers, pacifiers, blankets and more

game.name: Ochaken no Daibouken - Honwaka Yumemiru Sekai Ryokou (Japan)
game.description: Ochaken no Daibouken - Honwaka Yumemiru Sekai Ryokou (Japan)

game.name: Ochaken no Daibouken 2 - Yume Ippai no Omocha Bako (Japan)
game.description: Ochaken no Daibouken 2 - Yume Ippai no Omocha Bako (Japan)

game.name: Odoru Daisousa-sen - The Game - Sensuikan ni Sennyuu Seyo! (Japan)
game.description: Odoru Daisousa-sen - The Game - Sensuikan ni Sennyuu Seyo! (Japan)

game.name: Oekaki Puzzle Battle! - Yuusha Ou GaoGaiGar Hen (Japan)
game.description: Oekaki Puzzle Battle! - Yuusha Ou GaoGaiGar Hen (Japan)

game.name: Oha Star 645 - Musshees no Fushigi na Nouen - Yoshimoto Geinin to Tomodachi Net (Japan)
game.description: Oha Star 645 - Musshees no Fushigi na Nouen - Yoshimoto Geinin to Tomodachi Net (Japan)

game.name: Oishiku Kiwameru Shokutsuu DS - Otona no Shuumatsu Henshuubu Gensen no Osusume Omise Jouhou Iri (Japan)
game.description: Oishiku Kiwameru Shokutsuu DS - Otona no Shuumatsu Henshuubu Gensen no Osusume Omise Jouhou Iri (Japan)
game.story: Oishiku Kiwameru Shokutsuu DS est un titre sur Nintendo DS qui vous permet de vous améliorer en cuisine. Le jeu propose en effet plusieurs recettes de cuisine, notamment des plats traditionnels japonais.

game.name: Ojaru-Maru DS - Ojaru to Okeiko Aiueo (Japan)
game.description: Ojaru-Maru DS - Ojaru to Okeiko Aiueo (Japan)

game.name: OK! - First for Celebrity News - Puzzle Stars (Europe)
game.description: OK! - First for Celebrity News - Puzzle Stars (Europe)

game.name: Okada Toshio no Itsumademo Debu to Omounayo - DS de Recording Diet (Japan)
game.description: Okada Toshio no Itsumademo Debu to Omounayo - DS de Recording Diet (Japan)

game.name: Okamiden (USA)
game.story:
In a fitting reflection of the relationship shared with Amaterasu, the powerful sun goddess who embodied a wolf in Ōkami, the child deity Chibiterasu manifests in the form of a white wolf cub in Ōkamiden. The game is set nine months after the events of the previous game, and the young sun god is summoned to battle a sinister force that has drained the landscape of colour, leaving it withered and faded where once it was luminous with life.
Ōkamiden shares many gameplay elements with its predecessor, including the paintbrush used as a weapon against enemies and for puzzle solving. Chibiterasu can also team up with various companions during the game for additional abilities.

game.name: OMG 26 - Our Mini Games (USA)
game.story: An abandoned mansion in a small town, nicknamed 'ghost house' by the locals is the setting for Mystery Mansion. The strange and eerie sounds along with local stories of ghosts and ghouls prompt three adventurous members of the after school club to venture into the mansion and solve the mysteries within. Help the After School Club in their investigation by solving a series of spooky mini-games and ghoulish challenges and unravel the secrets of the Mystery Mansion.

game.name: One Piece - Gear Spirit (Japan)
game.story: One Piece: Gear Spirit is a fighting game for the Nintendo DS based on the manga and anime, One Piece. In the story mode the player fight random characters at different stages, and each character has two event stages where they battle a rival or another character that is related to their story in the anime. For instance, in Blackbeard's story, one of the characters he encounters in his event stage is Portgas D. Ace.

game.name: One Piece - Gigant Battle! (Europe)
game.story: You start in Schabondy Island and as you progress through each battle stage, you unlock new secret levels, characters, moves and even art pictures. You also unlock previous arcs which as Skypiea and Enies lobby. Over 20 or so different characters to play, including some of the fan favourites, Ace, Whitebeard, Jimbei, Ivankov, many more and obviously including the Straw hats. Along with support characters which are small characters in the series, such as Duval, the fighting seals you see in Alabasta, you can even have a few of your favourite Straw hats as your support characters. A lot of fun, with a great levelling up system with challenges in each battle to earn more Beli to purchase moves for your character and to become stronger.

game.name: One Piece Gigant Battle 2 - Shin Sekai (Japan)
game.description: One Piece Gigant Battle 2 - Shin Sekai (Japan)
game.story: One Piece: Gigant Battle 2 is a fighting video game developed by Ganbarion and published by Namco Bandai, released only in Japan on November 17, 2011 for the Nintendo DS. It is the sequel to the One Piece: Gigant Battle game.

game.name: Onegai My Melody - Yume no Kuni no Daibouken (Japan)
game.description: Onegai My Melody - Yume no Kuni no Daibouken (Japan)

game.name: Oni Zero - Sengoku Ranse Hyakka Ryouran (Japan)
game.description: Oni Zero - Sengoku Ranse Hyakka Ryouran (Japan)

game.name: Ontamarama (USA)
game.story:
Onpu Island is an island populated by musical spirits called Ontama. These strange, multicolored creatures can allow skilled performers, called 'Ontamaestros', to perform music by gathering Ontama. Beat and Rest, two young friends from a small village on the island, find an Ontama on the street. They discover that the Ontama are being captured, and so they set out to find out what's happening to them, and to become Ontamaestros themselves.
Ontamarama is an action rhythm game that makes full use of the DS' capabilities. Ontama appear on the screen, and can be tapped, tossed, and circled. Clearing an Ontama makes fills a note on the bar along the top of the screen, and when the note reaches the end of the bar, the correct button must be pressed to play the note. There are four different colored Ontama, and you also need to watch out for the white and black ones which can help or hinder you in other ways!
The game includes a story mode, a tutorial mode, a free play mode where you can play songs cleared in the story mode, and a challenge mode. There is also a shop where you can buy songs and items with points acquired during the game.

game.name: Ookami to Koushinryou - Boku to Holo no Ichinen (Japan)
game.description: Ookami to Koushinryou - Boku to Holo no Ichinen (Japan)
game.story: The player assumes the role of an unnamed young man as he travels around with Holo for a period of one year in the game. The story differs from that of the original novels or anime and is presented as an additional Spice and Wolf world.

game.name: Ookami to Koushinryou - Umi o Wataru Kaze (Japan)
game.description: Ookami to Koushinryou - Umi o Wataru Kaze (Japan)

game.name: Ookiku Furikabutte - Honto no Ace ni Nareru kamo (Japan)
game.description: Ookiku Furikabutte - Honto no Ace ni Nareru kamo (Japan)

game.name: Open Season (USA) (En,Fr,Es,Nl)
game.story:
Open Season is based on the Sony Pictures Animation's CG animated film of the same name, where a rowdy brood of forest animals turn the tables on a bunch of unsuspecting hunters.
The game is a side-scrolling-puzzle adventure. The plot of the game is to complete puzzles and avoid traps to advance from level to level. Every level completed will raise your friendship with the different animals of the forest. Once friends, these animals can be used as allies to attack and defeat the hunters encountered along the way.
Following the plot of the movie, once the player has become friends with a sufficient amount of animals, he can then take on the evil hunter leader Shaw.
The gameplay loop is to find clever ways to solve puzzles that prevent you from moving forward in a level. To solve these puzzles, the player can switch between the two main characters : Boog, a 900 pound bear and Elliott, a crazy deer. Both characters have their specific skills which need to be wisely used to progress through the levels. To solve most of the puzzles, Boog and Elliott, each controlled individually and seperately, will have to work as a team.
To complicate the gameplay a bit, the player will encounter hunters on the way which he can defeat "using" the now friendly skunks, beavers, squirrels... which all have their unique skills.
This game is a 2,5D side-scrolling game with an emphasis on spatial puzzles. The story mode contains 27 levels. In addition, there's also eight minigames.

game.name: Operation - Vietnam (USA)
game.story: On a routine run over the Vietnam war-zone your chopper is taken down in VC territory. It's up to you and your squad to make it out of the VC infested region while liberating civilians. You're in total command as you make your way through war-torn Vietnam and eliminate the VC insurgence

game.name: Orcs & Elves (USA) (En,Fr,De,Es,It)
game.story:
Orcs & Elves is a turn-based role-playing game based on improved DOOM RPG engine. The story follows an elf named Elli who, along with a talking magic wand Ellon, heads to the depths of a devastated dwarven citadel to find out what happened there, battling foes of many kinds, finding mysterious items and meeting various people.
The game uses a first person perspective and dungeons are grid-based, similar to the Dungeon Master and Eye of the Beholder series; the player can only move between squares, forward, backward, strafe left or right, turn in 90 degree increments. Enemies and dungeon features are drawn with sprite graphics. There are some 3D objects in the dungeons as well, and the game employs some 3D camera movements in the cutscenes. The dungeons mostly consist of one level, though it is possible to move between different parts of the dungeons and revisit the previous dungeons as necessary.

game.name: Ore ga Omae o Mamoru (Japan)
game.story: It is a Castlevania-like side-scrolling action game with RPG touches that was released under the "Otomate Forte" label, a sub-line of Idea Factory's "Otomate" (dating or romance games aimed at a female audience). The first of these games was a metroidvania / RPG with solid mechanics and an aesthetic aimed at the audience of "otome" games.

game.name: Ore-Sama Kingdom - Koi mo Manga mo Debut o Mezase! Doki Doki Love Lesson (Japan)
game.description: Ore-Sama Kingdom - Koi mo Manga mo Debut o Mezase! Doki Doki Love Lesson (Japan)

game.name: Original Frisbee Disc Sports - Ultimate & Golf (USA)
game.description: Original Frisbee Disc Sports - Ultimate & Golf (USA)
game.story: This title combines two different types of gameplay involving frisbees. Golf plays like a regular golf game, except without the sticks or balls. Instead the player goes through a course of eighteen holes to get the frisbee in the hole in as little throws

game.name: Original Rummikub, The - Brings People Together (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It,Nl) (Games Factory Online)
game.description: Original Rummikub, The - Brings People Together (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It,Nl) (Games Factory Online)
game.story: Rummikub sur Nintendo DS est l'adaptation du célèbre jeu de plateau, variante lui-même du rami. Le but est d'être le premier à se débarrasser de toutes ses tuiles, en les posant de manière à former des combinaisons. Il faut faire soit des suites de nombres qui se suivent, soit des séries de mêmes chiffres mais de couleur différente. On ne peut démarrer que si on peut poser une ou plusieurs combinaison totalisant au moins 30 points.

game.name: Original Story from Fairy Tail - Gekitotsu! Kardia Daiseidou (Japan)
game.description: Original Story from Fairy Tail - Gekitotsu! Kardia Daiseidou (Japan)
game.story: Fairy Tail Gekitotsu! Kardia Daiseidou is a video game of Fairy Tail for Nintendo DS. It is the second game created on the Nintendo DS, developed by Hudson and it follows the story of the Battle of Fairy Tail arc to the Oración Seis arc.

game.name: Oshare Majo Love and Berry - DS Collection (Japan)
game.description: Oshare Majo Love and Berry - DS Collection (Japan)

game.name: Oshiri Kajiri Mushi no Rhythm Lesson DS - Kawai Ongaku Kyoushitsu Kanshuu (Japan)
game.description: Oshiri Kajiri Mushi no Rhythm Lesson DS - Kawai Ongaku Kyoushitsu Kanshuu (Japan)

game.name: Osu! Tatakae! Ouendan (Japan)
game.story:
'Osu! Tatakae! Ouendan' is a music-based rhythm game on the Nintendo DS. The premise revolves around a troupe of men dressed in black uniforms that act as a "Cheersquad" (or 'Ouendan'). Their job: Aid anyone who is in need of motivation whenever they cry out "OUENDAN!!!" When the cry is heard, these guys appear and dance to music in order to motivate the person to finish his or her task.
The Cheersquad's success depends on how well the player does. The game takes advantage of the system's touch screen by having players tap circles in time with the beat of the music. Other actions include tapping a stack of circles repeatedly, following a moving ball along a path by dragging the stylus on it, and spinning a wheel. Each successful action fills a power bar at the top of the touch screen and contributes to the score. This bar drains continuously and will take large hits if the player misses a beat or two. If the bar hits zero, the game is over.
Ouendan contains 15 licensed songs with a level dedicated to each, and the songs are drawn from popular Japanese Rock. There are also 4 difficulty levels, 2 of which have to be unlocked through play. Each difficulty level alters the number of circles that need to be tapped, paths to trace, and wheels to spin. The timing of each is also changed, with easier difficulties giving more time to anticipate when to tap, while harder difficulties speed this up. A multiplayer mode is also featured, as well as a download & play option that sends the tutorial level to DS's that don't have the game.

game.name: Otogi Juushi Akazukin (Japan)
game.story: Otogi Juushi Akazukin is a Nintendo DS puzzle game. The title is inspired by the universe of a Japanese manga and its principle is simple: you must trace the route for a character so that he can exit each level. To achieve victory you have to move the pieces of a puzzle, creating a path to the exit.

game.name: Otome-teki Koi Kakumei - Love Revo!! DS (Japan) (Rev 1)
game.description: Otome-teki Koi Kakumei - Love Revo!! DS (Japan) (Rev 1)
game.story:
The main character, Hitomi Sakuragawa, was once a cute, beautiful girl, winning beauty contests in childhood. However, after losing to the temptation of junk food received from fans, she has steadily gained weight… until she reached 100 kg in her second year of high school.
At the beginning of the school year, the main character and her brother move into her father's mansion-like dorm. Surprise awaits as she discovers that the school's most popular guys are also moving in. Their impressions on her, shock her into starting a diet.

game.name: Otona no DS Mystery - Izumi Jiken File (Japan)
game.description: Otona no DS Mystery - Izumi Jiken File (Japan)

game.name: Otona no Renai Shousetsu - DS Harlequin Selection (Japan)
game.description: Otona no Renai Shousetsu - DS Harlequin Selection (Japan)

game.name: Otoshi Deka - Keiji-san, Watashi ga Yarimashita (Japan)
game.description: Otoshi Deka - Keiji-san, Watashi ga Yarimashita (Japan)

game.name: Oui-Oui - Grande Fete au Pays des Jouets (France)
game.description: Oui-Oui - Grande Fete au Pays des Jouets (France)
game.story: Oui-Oui: Big Party in Toy Land for Nintendo DS is an educational game for very young children. Using the marvelous world of Oui-Oui as its theme, the game contains some 15 activities, available in several levels of difficulty, to awaken their curiosity, with a particular focus on the foundations for learning to read.

game.name: Oui-Oui et le Grand Carnaval des Jouets (France)
game.description: Oui-Oui et le Grand Carnaval des Jouets (France)
game.story: Oui-oui Et Le Grand Carnaval Des Jouets on Nintendo DS is an educational game. A big carnival is going to take place and you are going to have to help Oui-Oui make it happen. On the menu, several activities: math games, memory, musical games and puzzles ...

game.name: Our House (USA)
game.story: Design your custom house, shop for raw materials, build your dwelling, decorate the interior to your liking, and then unveil your creation to the neighborhood! In Our House, you and your friends will race against the clock and each other to buy the best materials in the ultimate home-improvement store! But that's only half the fun, because after the mad rush, you'll construct your dream house with your purchases.

game.name: Over the Hedge (USA)
game.story:
A portable adventure game based on the animated movie of the same name and which chronicled the adventures of a group of animals in their struggle against a recently-built housing development.
Playing as either RJ, Hammy or Verne you'll have to complete several incursions into the human dwellings to steal food, supplies and sabotage further housing developments.
Gameplay-wise the game is a 3rd-person perspective stealth-adventure hybrid in which you must navigate through several houses looking to retrieve your current objective while avoiding the many traps set by the homeowners (as well as the homeowners themselves). To get by you can make use of several unique items that allow you to set up diversions, or create them yourself by blowing into the microphone. Each character has individual strengths and weaknesses and in many missions you'll have to alternate between each character to successfully complete the level.
As a unique feature the game displays the standard 3rd person perspective on the top screen while the lower screen features a top-down view which allows you to better scan the levels for traps and items, both rendered with fully polygonal graphics.
Features a single player campaign and a wireless multiplayer mode with a two-player mode in which two players compete to clear out a level of food.

game.name: Over the Hedge - Hammy Goes Nuts! (USA)
game.description: Over the Hedge - Hammy Goes Nuts! (USA)
game.story: Over the Hedge: Hammy Goes Nuts! is an all-new adventure based on the woodland creatures from DreamWorks Animation's hit film Over the Hedge. Fan favorite Hammy the squirrel leads RJ the raccoon, Verne the turtle and all-new forest friends on another daring trip into the 'burbs. When Hammy's beloved cable TV goes out, his buddies have to scramble through the neighborhood to restore the signal - and Hammy's happiness.

game.name: Overlord Minions (USA) (En,Fr,Es)
game.story: Meet Giblet, Blaze, Stench, and Zap - an elite Minion crew who, assisted by minion master Gnarl, get star billing in Overlord Minions, an irresistible and accessible puzzle action game, designed exclusively for Nintendo DS. In Overlord Minions, the Overlord commands the Minion team remotely. The Nintendo DS stylus becomes an extension of his evil will and every precise Touch Screen command is the player-as-Overlord directing, commanding and combining minions in battle, pointing and sweeping them to attack enemies and solving puzzles to execute his dastardly plans. Controlling the Special Farces team of four, players negotiate fiendish levels and take on a huge range of warped enemies to hunt down the Kindred, a cult dedicated to resurrecting the mighty Dragon Kin, a race of humanoid dragon hybrids, determined to replace the Overlord's despotism with their own. Extending the Overlord series' trademark humour, gameplay focuses on the mischievous physical comedy of the minion's antics and is delivered in a stylised cartoon visual style.

game.name: Oyako de Asoberu DS Ehon - Ukkari Penelope (Japan)
game.description: Oyako de Asoberu DS Ehon - Ukkari Penelope (Japan)

game.name: Pac'n Roll (USA)
game.story: In Pac'N Roll, the inhabitants of Pac-World have been turned into spheres by the evil monster Golvis' Ghost Light. Pac-Man must roll his way through Ghost-Land, collecting pellets and confronting Ghosts to save his family and restore peace to Pac-Land. Introducing an innovative new control scheme, Pac'N Roll lets players control Pac-Man with the Nintendo DS stylus. Players can roll and dash around the environment as well as execute maneuvers such as hairpin turns, immediate stops and precision rolling with effortless strokes of the stylus. In his quest to save Pac-Land, Pac-Man will venture through stages such as Castle Pac, Gyro-Jungle and the Ghost House, while facing perilous hazards like moving floors, dash panels, jump zones and wind zones. Along the way, Pac-Man will find power-ups like the Winged Chocolate, allowing him to fly through the worlds and jump over Ghosts, or the "Knight Chocolate," providing him with armor which grants him the power to crash through walls and withstand more damage. Pac'N Roll also includes the original Pac-Man arcade game, allowing up to two players to munch on pellets and claim the highest score.

game.name: Pac-Man World 3 (USA)
game.story:
Pac-Man is teleported by Orson through 14 different levels to fight Erwin, his army of robots, monsters and Spectral Entities to save the world, Pac-Land and the Spectral Realm. Erwin plans to siphon spectral energy from the Spectral Realm to power his army of robots in order to rule the world. Pac-Man uses punching, Rev Rolls, Butt-Bouncing and various new Power Pellets to defeat Erwin and his minions. Pac-Man also pilots Toc-Man in a battle against Erwin’s robot army.
Joined by Pac-Man’s old enemies, Orson, Clyde and Pinky, and new friends along the way, Pac-Man adventures through different levels from a boneyard of old bots to a burning tower, up mountains, through deserts and the Spectral Realm to destroy all of Erwin’s Spectral Syphons. In this title, Pac-Man has also been given full speech, voiced by Martin T. Sherman.

game.name: Pac-Pix (USA)
game.story:
Pac-Pix originally started as a tech-demo for the Nintendo DS when the DS was first announced. Many people at E3 liked the demo so much that Namco made it a full-fledged game. In this DS exclusive title, Pac-Man has been captured by the ghosts and you must save him. You use the touch-screen to draw Pac-Man and try to eat the ghosts. There are a few different types of ghosts that require a different strategy for each type.
You have Pinky that just moves around slowly and Blue that will make a quick dash as you approach him. There is Numboos which is multiple ghosts with numbers and you must eat them in order if you wish to defeat them. Bari-Boo has a shield and you can only defeat him by attacking from behind, if you hit his shield in front of him or from the side you just bounce off. There's the ink ghosts which throw ink and then there's the block ghosts which require you to break their defenses with a bomb.
During your adventure you will learn to draw arrows to shoot ghosts and stun them, as well as ghosts that are floating in bubbles. You will also be able to draw bombs to destroy blocks that are in your path. There are many things to do with the touch screen in this game. Pac-Pix is a Pac-Man game like no other before it.

game.name: Paint by DS (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It)
game.story: Paint by DS on the Nintendo DS is a game that transforms your stylus into a brush and lets you repaint the canvases of the greatest artists. Use your DS to mix colours and reproduce 15 large paintings. Complete mini-games to get new brushes, papers, colours and show off your skills as your designs are judged when completed.

game.name: Paint by DS - Military Vehicles (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It)
game.story: Paint by DS: Military Vehicles is a game which transforms your stylus into a paintbrush. You can paint a variety of military vehicles from tanks to fighter planes. Use your stylus to mix the colours and show your art skills on 15 different models. Play mini-games to get new brushes, papers, colours and hone your skills as your designs will be judged once you're finished.

game.name: Panzer Tactics DS (USA) (En,Fr,De,Es,It)
game.story:
This turn-based WWII strategy game includes three campaigns involving the German Wehrmacht, the Red Army and the Western Allies. Players direct their troops, historically accurate tanks, artillery, naval, and aviation units, to engage enemy units, capture cities, and establish supply lines. Hex-maps cover terrain ranging from the deserts of North Africa to the frozen Russian tundra.
In addition to three single-player campaigns, Panzer Tactics DS also has multiplayer support.

game.name: Party Carnival (Europe)
game.story: Party Carnival is a party game for Nintendo DS. A total of 38 mini-games are waiting for you. Some of the minigames : the chifoumi (stone / paper / scissors), the teaser (reconstruct an image by pushing boxes), memory (remember a sequence of buttons as long as possible) and much more. A multi mode allows you to compete with friends, up to 4 players.

game.name: Pass the Pigs - Let the Good Swines Roll! (USA)
game.description: Pass the Pigs - Let the Good Swines Roll! (USA)
game.story: With over 32 millions board games sold, go hog wild with the pig-tastic, quirky Pass the Pigs game. Use chance to attempt to rack up 100 points by Pig Rolling the stylus around the world, depending on how the pigs land you might get a snouter or a double razor back don't get greedy & you must Pass the Pigs before you 'Pig Out' and lose all your points!

game.name: Pass Your Driving Theory Test - 2010 Edition (Europe)
game.description: Pass Your Driving Theory Test - 2010 Edition (Europe)

game.name: Patto Tokeru! - India Suugaku Drill DS - Jiman Shitaku Naru Anzan Hou (Japan)
game.description: Patto Tokeru! - India Suugaku Drill DS - Jiman Shitaku Naru Anzan Hou (Japan)

game.name: Paws & Claws - Best Friends - Dogs & Cats (USA)
game.description: Paws & Claws - Best Friends - Dogs & Cats (USA)
game.story: In "Dogs & Cats Best Friend" you have the unique opportunity to play with and cuddle Dalmatian, Husky, German Shepherd and Retriever puppies and Siamese, Maine Coon, British Blue And Domestic cats and to teach them lots of fun tricks, with a little patience they will obey your every word.

game.name: Paws & Claws - Marine Rescue (USA) (NDSi Enhanced)
game.story: Rescue, Rehabilitate, Release! Make a difference at your very own Paws & Claws Marine Rescue as you diagnose, treat and care for injured animals. Release the healthy animals back into the wild to swim and roam freely!

game.name: Paws & Claws - Pampered Pets (USA)
game.story: Luxury and extravagance are the way of life at the Paws & Claws Pampered Pets Spa.

game.name: Paws & Claws - Pampered Pets 2 (USA) (NDSi Enhanced)
game.story: It's the Ultimate Luxury Spa for Pets! Now you can pamper and indulge all of your clients as owner of the Paws and Claws Pet Spa - the premier spa for pets who deserve the very best. Spoil your furry friends with world-class treatments. Massage, bathing, grooming, even acupuncture and aromatherapy. Have fun with more of your favorite animals including cats, dogs, bunnies, guinea pigs and hamsters.

game.name: Paws & Claws - Pet Resort (USA)
game.story: You love animals and they love you! Care for and pamper all of your favorite creatures at your own Paws and Claws Pet Resort. Nurture and love the animals to grow your pet care business and become every animal's best friend!

game.name: Paws & Claws - Pet Vet (USA)
game.story: You love animals and they love you! Congratulations! You're the owner of your very own Paws & Claws Pet Clinic! It's your job to nurture and love all of the animals to bring them back to health. Grow your vet clinic into a thriving business and become every animal's best friend!

game.name: Paws & Claws - Pet Vet - Australian Adventures (USA)
game.description: Paws & Claws - Pet Vet - Australian Adventures (USA)
game.story: Get ready for an adventure at your very own Paws & Claws Pet Vet clinic down under! Its your job to nurture and love all of the wild animals down under and bring them back to health.

game.name: Paws & Claws - Pet Vet 2 (USA)
game.story: Care for All Creatures Great and Small! Let the love in your heart and your skills as a vet guide you as you nurse your pet friends back to health. No matter how big or small the animal, they want you in their time of need! Nurture them as you grow your pet care business and become every animal's best friend!

game.name: Paws & Claws - Regal Resort (USA)
game.story: In Paws & Claws Regal Resort, players can mix business with their love for animals by building and managing the finest pet resort while also caring for guests' pets. In the game, players can expand their resort with six types of animals - dogs, cats, horses, hamsters, birds, and rabbits - and optimize their experience by feeding, bathing and exercising the animals. As a resort becomes more popular, upgrades will be necessary to keep the animals happy, so players will need to venture into town to purchase supplies. If players are too busy caring for the animals and cannot go to town for supplies, they can read up on facts about each animal and take quizzes in order to unlock upgrades for the resort.

game.name: PDC World Championship Darts (USA) (En,Fr,Es,It,Nl)
game.story:
PDC World Championship Darts 2009 is the 2009 iteration in the series.
Like previous versions it has an official license and includes 18 official top pro players and events from all over the world. The character creator has been improved, new events are available and it is now also possible to play as a female player. The controls have been completely revamped from the previous Wii version.

game.name: Peggle Dual Shot (USA)
game.story: It's the ultimate Peggle... with dual-screen action! Shoot and clear the orange pegs from 120 levels spanning two full adventure modes in this action-packed PopCap hit! Learn 11 Magic Powers, score amazing style shots, and discover the exclusive Bonus Underground filled with valuable gems and power-ups. And the action doesn't end there take your best shot in Multiplayer Duel and Quick Play modes, then put your skills to the ultimate test with 90 challenges!

game.name: Pekin Express - La Route de l'Himalaya (France)
game.description: Pekin Express - La Route de l'Himalaya (France)
game.story: Beijing Express: The Himalayan Route on DS is an adaptation of the television show of the same name. The progression is divided into 10 stages, themselves divided into three phases: the race, the immunity test and the sprint. Each of these phases takes the form of one or more mini-games.

game.name: Pen1 Grand Prix - Penguin no Mondai Special (Japan)
game.description: Pen1 Grand Prix - Penguin no Mondai Special (Japan)
game.story: Penguin no Mondai est un jeu d'action/aventure pour enfants sur Nintendo DS, tiré de la célèbre série animée japonaise éponyme.

game.name: Penguin no Mondai - Saikyou Penguin Densetsu! (Japan)
game.description: Penguin no Mondai - Saikyou Penguin Densetsu! (Japan)

game.name: Penguin no Mondai X - Tenkuu no 7 Senshi (Japan)
game.description: Penguin no Mondai X - Tenkuu no 7 Senshi (Japan)
game.story: Penguin no Mondai X (A Penguin's Troubles X) is based on the comedy manga, Penguin no Mondai, by Yuuji Nagai. The game follows the adventures of a teenage penguin called Kinoshita as he sets out to become a powerful warrior and defend humanity against the seven warriors of the sky.

game.name: Penguins of Madagascar, The (USA) (En,Fr) (NDSi Enhanced)
game.story: Team Penguin, the unsung heroes of the zoo - Skipper, Kowalski, Rico and Private, have been tasked with new madcap missions! The Penguins use teamwork to complete levels and build useful tools and gadgets to advance in the game. Packed with exciting puzzles to solve, the player alternates between the Penguins, performing acrobatic moves, unlocking paths and creating helpful contraptions. The game also features stealth-based missions, super silly interactive moments, bonus levels and mini-games.

game.name: Penguins of Madagascar, The - Dr. Blowhole Returns Again! (USA) (En,Fr) (NDSi Enhanced)
game.description: Penguins of Madagascar, The - Dr. Blowhole Returns Again! (USA) (En,Fr) (NDSi Enhanced)
game.story: Team Penguin, the unsung heroes of the zoo - Skipper, Kowalski, Rico and Private, have been tasked with new madcap missions! The Penguins use teamwork to complete levels and build useful tools and gadgets to advance in the game. Packed with exciting puzzles to solve, the player alternates between the Penguins, performing acrobatic moves, unlocking paths and creating helpful contraptions. The game also features stealth-based missions, super silly interactive moments, bonus levels and mini-games.

game.name: Percy Jackson and the Olympians - The Lightning Thief (USA) (En,Fr)
game.description: Percy Jackson and the Olympians - The Lightning Thief (USA) (En,Fr)
game.story: Based upon the first novel in author Rick Riordan's best-selling book series, Percy Jackson & The Olympians: The Lightning Thief is set in a modern world where the twelve gods of Mount Olympus are alive, Percy Jackson, the teenage son of Poseidon, is suspected by Zeus of stealing his lightning bolt, the universe's most powerful weapon. Percy must prove his innocence, save his mother, and avoid a devastating war among the gods.

game.name: Perfect Kanji Keisan Master DS (Japan) (Not for Resale)
game.description: Perfect Kanji Keisan Master DS (Japan) (Not for Resale)

game.name: Personal Fitness for Men (USA) (En,Fr,Es)
game.story: Benefit from a high intensity workout no matter where you're at with Personal Fitness. Choose from pre-defined training schedules or build a unique custom workout as your personal fitness coach leads you through physical training and education. The training schedules tailored towards your fitness goals will help to ensure you reach and maintain your fitness goals. Specialized training schedules such as 'Six-Pack of Steel' is just one example of what awaits you in your journey to good health.

game.name: Personal Fitness for Women (USA) (En,Fr,Es)
game.story: Benefit from a high intensity workout no matter where you're at with Personal Fitness. Choose from pre-defined training schedules or build a unique custom workout as your personal fitness coach leads you through physical training and education. The training schedules tailored towards your fitness goals will help to ensure you reach and maintain your fitness goals. Specialized training schedules such as '30 Minutes for Beauty' is just one example of what awaits you in your journey to good health.

game.name: Personal Trainer - Cooking (USA)
game.story: Personal Trainer: Cooking includes more than 200 recipes from around the world and transforms the Nintendo DS into an electronic, interactive cookbook, complete with a glossary of terms and even instructional videos.

game.name: Personal Trainer - Math (USA) (En,Fr,Es)
game.story: Do you ever struggle with calculating a dinner bill or confirming exact change at the cash register? What about helping children with their homework? Help is here! Personal Trainer: Math for Nintendo DS is a fun and rewarding way to keep those math skills sharp.

game.name: Personal Trainer - Walking (USA) (En,Fr,Es)
game.story: The Wii Fit exercise craze comes to the DS, with Nintendo's latest attempt to make video gaming the healthiest hobby around. This unique Touch! Generations game comes bundled with two pedometers, which are able to analyse how much exercise you get from walking and jogging around each day.

game.name: Pet Adoption Center (USA) (En,Fr,De,Nl)
game.story: Care for and help find new homes for all the animals at Sunflower Pet Adoption Center. Nestled in a large, one-of-a-kind outdoor facility, it's the perfect mix of outdoor and indoor pet accommodations. As the manager of the center, you will take care of a variety of loveable pets, including cats, dogs, bunnies, hamsters, guinea pigs, and even baby horses and deer.

game.name: Pet Alien - An Intergalactic Puzzlepalooza (USA) (En,Fr,Es)
game.story: Just like the show Pet Alien, the game chronicles a pre-adolescent Earthling named Tommy Cadle, whose life is turned upside down after the arrival of his new alien friends, Gumpers, Dinko, Swanky, Flip and Scruffy. When Tommy is kidnapped by the evil Robotix, Gumpers and friends have to battle through space using their unique alien agility, brains, brawn and speed to rescue their human friend.

game.name: Pet Pals - Animal Doctor (USA)
game.story: In Pet Pals: Animal Doctor, players will learn the techniques required to diagnose and treat 23 different lovable pets, including a Yorkshire terrier, turtle, parakeet, rabbit and hamster. To do so, players must successfully administer more than 40 Touch Screen tests while interacting with stressed patients and concerned pet owners. Players face 30 different real-life medical cases from hairballs to infections to broken bones that add authenticity to the gameplay.

game.name: Pet Pals - New Leash on Life (USA)
game.description: Pet Pals - New Leash on Life (USA)
game.story: Step into the role of a veterinarian as you care for pet friends of all shapes and sizes. Take part in over 30 animal cases created by practicing veterinarians from around the world. Designed for aspiring vets of all ages, players can take part in each animals story and control their fate in rich and realistic gameplay.

game.name: Pet Vet - Down Under (USA) (En,Fr)
game.story: The new water worlds, funny animated games with Australia's most popular wildlife, a fully illustrated sector of knowledge and many more features make MY ANIMAL CENTRE in Australia an inimitable experience. By using the Nintendo DS stylus the patients can be examined, feeded and stroked. The player will be amazed due to the different reactions of the animals when he plays with or medicates them.

game.name: Peter Jackson's King Kong - The Official Game of the Movie (USA) (En,Fr,De,Es,It,Nl,Sv,No,Da,Fi) (Rev 1)
game.description: Peter Jackson's King Kong - The Official Game of the Movie (USA) (En,Fr,De,Es,It,Nl,Sv,No,Da,Fi) (Rev 1)
game.story: Embark on an epic adventure created in collaboration with Academy Award-winning director Peter Jackson and based on the Universal Pictures' film. Survive as Jack in a world crawling with predators and live the legend as Kong. Use weapons, traps, and your team wisely to survive in first-person as Jack. Break jaws, slam enemies, and throw massive objects in Kong's colossal third-person battles.

game.name: Petit Fute Travel and Play (France)
game.story: Petit Futé Travel & Play on DS helps you choose the destination of your next trip based on a multitude of different criteria: your budget, length of stay, leisure activities on site ... It is also possible to browse an interactive atlas on which each country is detailed, to convert currencies, to know the time difference and also to learn a few sentences to get by. 5 mini-games are also present to distract yourself while waiting for the train.

game.name: Petz - Bunnyz (USA) (En,Fr,De,Es,It,Nl)
game.story: Now you can have your very own bunny for a pet. Choose your bunny's breed and environment and if you keep your bunny happy, you can unlock such decorating items as toys, wallpaper, and flowers. You can have hours of fun playing with and training your bunny.

game.name: Petz - Bunnyz Bunch (USA) (En,Fr,Es)
game.story: Now you can have your very own bunny for a pet. Choose your bunny's breed and environment and if you keep your bunny happy, you can unlock such decorating items as toys, wallpaper, and flowers. You can have hours of fun playing with and training your bunny.

game.name: Petz - Catz 2 (USA) (En,Fr,Es)
game.story: Welcome back to the adorable world of Catz! In Petz Catz 2, you can now pick your perfect pet companion from over 40 different breeds. Feed and groom her, play with her and pick out toys, accessories and even little outfits to make your cutie even cuter!

game.name: Petz - Catz Clan (USA) (En,Fr,De,Es,It,Nl,Sv,No,Da) (Rev 1)
game.story: For the first time ever in the Petz series, create an entire family of dogs, cats, horses and monkeys. Crossbreed and create your own looks and personality for your pet. Raise your pet and create a strong relationship.

game.name: Petz - Catz Playground (USA) (En,Fr,De,Es,It)
game.story: For the first time ever in the Petz series, create an entire family of dogs, cats, horses and monkeys. Crossbreed and create your own looks and personality for your pet. Raise your pet and create a strong relationship.

game.name: Petz - Dogz 2 (USA) (En,Fr,De,Es,It)
game.story:
Dogz 2 is the sequel to the Nintendo DS Dogz, a title of the Nintendo DS Petz series.
Differently to the traditional pet games, the focus of Dogz 2 is in the 18 mini-games, seven of which are card games that can be played in multiplayer, like blackjack and memory games, which will give the player goodies, like furniture and toys and costumes for the dogs and even more rooms of the house, after completed or won. There are 11 different breeds (like dalmatian, beagle or poodle) to choose from this time and 250 different items to fill the house with.
There is no pet caring in Dogz 2, but there is still plenty of interaction with them. Many of the collectibles may produce a reaction on the dogs. The player can also make his/her puppies to wear costumes and even give them 14 different oral orders through the microphone of the DS.

game.name: Petz - Dogz Fashion (USA) (En,Fr,Es) (Rev 1)
game.story: Dress your favorite puppies in the hottest fashions and help make the cutest puppies even cuter.

game.name: Petz - Dogz Pack (USA) (En,Fr,De,Es,It,Nl,Sv,No,Da) (Rev 1)
game.story: There's a whole family of dogs you can adopt and love! Take care of them, discover their unique personalities, and teach them fun tricks! Choose from favorite breeds like Golden Retrievers and Labradors in this downloadable entry in the Petz franchise made exclusively for doggie people. In Petz Dogz Pack you can. Adopt your favorite pet from some of the most well-known breeds. Watch your pet grow in three stages: baby, child and adult. Experiment with breeding to create unique pets that fit your personality. Impact your pet's relationships with others by the way you decide to raise your pet. Up to three pets can play together for you to watch -- the way they interact with each other depends on the player.

game.name: Petz - Dogz Talent Show (USA) (En,Fr,De,Es,It)
game.story: In Ubisoft's Petz Dogz Talent Show, players can make their dogs into the stars they've always wanted them to be: care for them, discover their personality and train them in a variety of fun activities to turn them into talented Petz.

game.name: Petz - Dolphinz Encounter (USA) (En,Fr,Es) (NDSi Enhanced)
game.story: In Ubisoft's Petz Dolphinz Encounter, play as a new member of the Ocean Rescue Team, and explore the seas and oceans on board the Delphis submarine. Rescue, swim and interact with dolphins and other sea creatures while you build relationships with them!

game.name: Petz - Hamsterz Life 2 (USA) (En,Fr,De,Es,It,Nl) (Rev 1)
game.story: Hamsterz Life 2 features more than 90 different hamsters for hours of fun with your Petz! Each hamster will get attached to you slowly, as you take care of it and play with it. Create and customize your hamsters' cages, play lots of mini-games and let them meet their fellow friends. Thanks to the Nintendo wireless system, you will be able to see your friends' pets and even trade your own hamsters!

game.name: Petz - Hamsterz Superstars (USA) (En,Fr,De,Es,It,Nl,Sv,No,Da)
game.story: Train your hamsters in goofy activities and turn them into Super Stars: care for them, discover their personality and skills, train them in a variety of funny and wacky activities.

game.name: Petz - Horseshoe Ranch (USA) (En,Fr,De,Es,It,Nl,Sv,No,Da)
game.story: Pick the perfect horse from lots of breeds, or create your own pony! Help your horse grow from a child to an adult, and influence its personality. Customize its look with more than 75 items of clothing and accessories, and unlock new toys that your horses can play with. You can even send your horse to a friend's Nintendo DS to set up play dates!

game.name: Petz - Horsez 2 (USA) (En,Fr,Es)
game.story: This is the second game in the Petz Horsez series. Choose from five different horse breeds. As you raise your foal you learn to groom, play and feed him. Your horse develops and so will you allowing you both to complete at the highest level.

game.name: Petz - Horsez Family (USA) (En,Fr,Es) (NDSi Enhanced)
game.story: Petz Horsez Family is the ultimate horse nurturing game. Care for a variety of horses at the Summer Camp Stables, bond with them, train them and even compete in fun challenges. Be a proud caretaker of your own horses as you learn how to take care of them and help them become strong and successful horses.

game.name: Petz - Monkeyz House (USA) (En,Fr,De,Es,It,Nl,Sv,No,Da)
game.story: Petz Monkeyz House you can adopt an adorable monkey from a variety of breeds to raise, care for, and have fun with. Play with three monkeys at the same time and experience all the wacky fun! Unlock dozens of cool items including costumes, toys, and environments for your monkey to play in.

game.name: Petz - Nursery (USA) (En,Fr,De,Es,It,Nl,Sv,No,Da)
game.story: In Ubisoft's Petz Nursery, players can care for and bond with a variety of the cutest newborn animals, from dogs to polar bears. Help them grow into strong and healthy animals!

game.name: Petz - Nursery 2 (USA) (En,Fr,Es)
game.story: Players care for a variety of all-new baby animals ranging from puppies to polar bear cubs and even penguins! Take care of all your baby petz and help them grow. As newborns, your baby petz will need to be fed a bottle, picked up and played with, and eventually taught to crawl. When night comes, help them fall asleep by rocking them or singing them a lullaby. Also, for the first time, take care of two animals at the same time, watch them play together, react to one another and even try to eat each other's food! From newborns to babies, these cute animals will surprise players with their clumsy and funny personalities.

game.name: Petz - Pony Beauty Pageant (USA) (En,Fr,Es)
game.story: Take care of pretty ponyz, make them beautiful and enter them in beauty pageants to lead the Grand Pony Parade.

game.name: Petz - Puppyz & Kittenz (USA) (En,Fr,Es)
game.story: Petz, the #1 handheld pet-simulation brand in 2010, introduces an all-new game where you can care for and love the most adorable puppy and kitten duo as you help them grow and become best friends. Watch out, though, because some breeds will need more time and nurturing before they become good friends! With a wide variety of fun activities and different pet personalities, these Petz will never cease to amaze you. Feed them, help them grow, and watch the adorableness unravel as the puppies and kittens grow and play together.

game.name: Petz - Wild Animals - Dolphinz (USA) (En,Fr,Es)
game.story: As a young boy or girl, you're sent to work into your uncle's Marine Zoo as a summer job. The park is located on a tropical island but the place is in danger, as a multi-national real estate company plans to wipe the park out of the map to construct a luxury hotel.

game.name: Petz - Wild Animals - Tigerz (USA) (En,Fr,Es)
game.story: Enzo and Ana, two animal apprentice trainers, just receive 2 young tigers belonging to an endangered species from their grandfather. In order to take care of them, they need to earn money while saving their family training agency from bankruptcy. As an apprentice trainer you will have to help trainers who have problems with their star animals all over the world.

game.name: Petz Fantasy - Moonlight Magic (USA) (En,Fr,Es) (NDSi Enhanced)
game.story: For the first time ever, discover and take care of your very own fantasy pets. Enter a world of fantasy where you discover mysterious eggs that hatch into cute fantasy creatures in Petz Fantasy: Moonlight Magic. Each fantasy creature has its own personality, surprising reactions and magical powers. Help them grow by caring for them, feeding them and teaching them their magical powers. Above all, keep your fantasy Petz a secret from your parents!

game.name: Petz Fantasy - Sunshine Magic (USA) (En,Fr,Es) (NDSi Enhanced)
game.story: For the first time ever, discover and take care of your very own fantasy petz. Enter a world of fantasy where you discover mysterious eggs that hatch into cute fantasy creatures in Petz Fantasy Sunshine Magic and Petz Fantasy Moonlight Magic. Each fantasy creature has its own personality, surprising reactions and magical powers. Help them grow by caring for them, feeding them, and teaching them. Train them in their new magical powers.

game.name: Petz Fashion - Dogz & Catz (USA) (En,Fr,Es)
game.story: Design cute and stylish outfits for your puppy or kitten, dress them up and enter them in fashion shows with Petz Fashion: Dogz & Catz. Choose your kitten or puppy from a large variety of breeds, care for them and develop a strong relationship with them. Use the stylus to design unique patterns and pick from different colors to create cute outfits for your pet kitten or puppy. You can also choose from a variety of trendy outfits and accessories suited to your pet's liking. Dress up your pet and show off your creation in fashion contests, and work your way up to become a posh pet clothing designer. Unlock new outfits, accessories and items for your house with money earned from your fashion success.

game.name: Petz Rescue - Endangered Paradise (USA) (En,Fr,Es)
game.story: As a member of the Earth Rescue Team (ERT), your mission is to save the wildlife on a beautiful island that has been threatened by pollution.

game.name: Petz Rescue - Ocean Patrol (USA) (En,Fr,Es)
game.story: Players take on the role of Greg or Mila, and help their uncle save endangered marine species. Cruise around an undiscovered island and rescue hurt or sick sea animals. Explore the island to develop open space pools, while respecting the environment. With the help of specialists, take care of and heal the many different animals before releasing them into the ocean. Save the endangered marine species and try to help the rarest of them all: the giant Blue Whale.

game.name: Petz Rescue - Wildlife Vet (USA) (En,Fr,Es,Pt)
game.story: Play as a young vet, who has just opened their first animal clinic. Take care of your neighbors' domesticated pets, as well as the local exotic baby animals. Diagnose, cure, observe and heal the animals to gain your clients' confidence and respect. Uncover the mystery behind the animals' illnesses. Investigate to find out if the local factory could be polluting the rivers and thus be causing the animals' diseases. Face real challenges on the journey to becoming a great veterinarian, and possibly join one of the world's most prestigious NGOs.

game.name: Pferd & Pony - Die Reitakademie (Europe) (En,De)
game.story: Real Stories: Cheval Academy for DS is part of a range of games that will bring many adventures and experiences. It is here in the academy of the most beautiful horses that the game will take the players to complete many tests (brush your horse, ride it in different environments, etc.).

game.name: Pferd & Pony - Mein Gestuet - Ein Leben fuer die Pferde (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It)
game.description: Pferd & Pony - Mein Gestuet - Ein Leben fuer die Pferde (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It)

game.name: Pferdefreunde Puzzle - Echter Puzzlespass fuer Unterwegs (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It)
game.description: Pferdefreunde Puzzle - Echter Puzzlespass fuer Unterwegs (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It)

game.name: Phantasy Star 0 (USA)
game.story: Phantasy Star Zero takes place on an alternate Earth 200 years after the Great Blank, a massive war that has reduced the once-prosperous civilization to almost nothing. The sole surviving Humans have worked hard to exist peacefully and have built thriving Cities. The Humans that adventure past the outskirts of these Cities, called Hunters, explore the vast wilderness and hunt dangerous monsters to keep Cities safe. Players will take up the role of Hunters and select from three types of races and different classes, as well as gender for a total of 14 customizable character types. Each character type will play very differently and give players access to a great range of items, armor and weapons. Featuring over 350 unique weapons, gamers will venture out on Earth, combat dangerous monsters to gain experience and meet new major characters. As players explore further, they will unravel the mystery of the Great Blank and discover a dangerous new force that must be stopped.

game.name: Phineas and Ferb (USA) (Rev 1)
game.story: Phineas and Ferb for Nintendo DS invites fans to play as the characters Phineas and Ferb in a series of wacky, fun-filled adventures. As Phineas and Ferb, players can build the world's most outrageous roller coaster from their backyard to the city; create a humungous snow ride from a snow cone machine - in the middle of summer; and hop behind the wheel of a monster truck and navigate through a muddy obstacle course. Along the way, players can use cool gadgets and objects that give them special powers. They also can complete unique mini games and puzzles such as Welding, Wind Blaster, and "You're so busted!" mini games with Candace in order to advance through levels.

game.name: Phineas and Ferb - 2 Disney Games (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It,Nl) (NDSi Enhanced)
game.description: Phineas and Ferb - 2 Disney Games (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It,Nl) (NDSi Enhanced)

game.name: Phineas and Ferb - Across the 2nd Dimension (USA) (En,Fr,Es)
game.description: Phineas and Ferb - Across the 2nd Dimension (USA) (En,Fr,Es)
game.story: Phineas and Ferb: Across the Second Dimension for Nintendo DS takes players on an exciting journey through all new environments in an all new fun-filled game. Play as Phineas, Ferb or Agent P and master combat techniques to battle and overcome enemy drones using gadgets and combat maneuvers while leveling up through over 30 stages to defeat the evil Dr. D and his minions and save the world.

game.name: Phineas and Ferb - Quest for Cool Stuff (USA)
game.description: Phineas and Ferb - Quest for Cool Stuff (USA)
game.story: Join Phineas and Ferb as they travel to out-of-this-world places in their newest invention, the A.T.T. (All-Terrain Transformatron). This upgradeable, customizable, ultra-cool amphibious ride helps the boys hunt for lost loot to display in their backyard Museum of Cool.
